item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Details data type represents a virus scan agent and contains details about its version. Local agentVersion Version number of the anti-virus scan agent. Type: string lastUpdate The date of the last time the anti-virus agent checked in. Type: string Relational currentPolicy The current anti-virus policy of an agent. Type: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Agent_Parent_Details

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event data type represents a single anti-virus event. It contains details about the event such as the date the event occurred, the virus that is detected and the action that is taken. Local eventLocalDateTime The date when an anti-virus event occurs. Type: dateTime filename Name of the file found to be infected. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Antivirus_Event_AccessProtection data type represents an access protection event. It contains details about the event such as when it occurs, the process that caused it, and the rule that triggered the event. Local eventLocalDateTime The date that an access protection event occurs. Type: dateTime filename The name of the file that was protected from access. Type: string

item.title: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent
item.description: McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent Datatype Description The McAfee_Epolicy_Orchestrator_Version36_Hips_Version6_BlockedApplicationEvent data type contains a single blocked application event. The details of the event are the time the event occurred, the process that generated the event and a brief description of the application that was blocked. Local applicationDescription A brief description of the application that is blocked. Type: string incidentTime The time that an application is blocked.

It contains details about the event such as the date the event occurred, the process that generated it, the severity of the event, and the action taken. item.title: SoftLayer_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Account Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer customer account. Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are assigned to the account only and not to users belonging to the account. The SoftLayer_Account data type contains a number of relational properties that are used by the SoftLayer customer portal to quickly present a variety of account related services to it’s users.

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_AbuseEmail
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_AbuseEmail Datatype Description An unfortunate facet of the hosting business is the necessity of with legal and network abuse inquiries. As these types of inquiries frequently contain sensitive information SoftLayer keeps a separate account contact email address for direct contact about legal and abuse matters, modeled by the SoftLayer_Account_AbuseEmail data type. SoftLayer will typically email an account’s abuse email addresses in these types of cases, and an email is automatically sent to an account’s abuse email addresses when a legal or abuse ticket is created or updated.

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Address
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Address Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account_Address data type contains information on an address associated with a SoftLayer account. Local accountId Type: integer address1 Line 1 of the address (normally the street address). Type: string address2 Line 2 of the address. Type: string city The city of the address. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Attribute Datatype Description Many SoftLayer customer accounts have individual attributes assigned to them that describe features or special features for that account, such as special pricing, account statuses, and ordering instructions. The SoftLayer_Account_Attribute data type contains information relating to a single SoftLayer_Account attribute. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account::getAttributes seeAlso SoftLayer_Account SoftLayer_Account_Attribute_Type Local accountAttributeTypeId The internal identifier of the type of attribute that a SoftLayer customer account attribute belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Attribute_Type Datatype Description SoftLayer_Account_Attribute_Type models the type of attribute that can be assigned to a SoftLayer customer account. seeAlso SoftLayer_Account_Attribute Local description A brief description of a SoftLayer account attribute type. Type: string id A SoftLayer account attribute type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyName A SoftLayer account attribute type's key name. This is typically a shorter version of an attribute type's name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Attribute Service Datatype Description Account authentication has many different settings that can be set. This class allows the customer or employee to set these settigns. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Saml::getAttributes seeAlso SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Saml SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Attribute_Type Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that is assigned an account authenction attribute. Type: integer id A SoftLayer account authenction attribute's internal identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Attribute_Type Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Attribute_Type models the type of attribute that can be assigned to a SoftLayer customer account authentication. seeAlso SoftLayer_Account_Authentication_Attribute Local description A brief description of a SoftLayer account authentication attribute type. Type: string id A SoftLayer account authentication attribute type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyName A SoftLayer account authentication attribute type's key name.

item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Media_Data_Transfer_Request Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account_Media_Data_Transfer_Request data type contains information on a single Data Transfer Service request. item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Media_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Media_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account_Media_Type data type contains general information relating to the different types of media devices that SoftLayer currently supports, as part of the Data Transfer Request Service. Such devices as USB hard drives and flash drives, as well as optical media such as CD and DVD are currently supported. Local description The description of the media type. Type: string

Type: integer id A username/password combination's internal identifier. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Password_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Password_Type Datatype Description Every username and password combination associated with a SoftLayer customer account belongs to a service that SoftLayer provides. The relationship between a username/password and it’s service is provided by the SoftLayer_Account_Password_Type data type. Each username/password belongs to a single service type. seeAlso SoftLayer_Account_Password Local description A description of the use for the account username/password combination. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail Service Datatype Description Local accountId The detail object's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id Type: integer createDate The date and time the detail object was created Type: dateTime detailTypeId The detail object's associated [[SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Type|type]] id Type: integer id Unique ID of the detail object Type: integer modifyDate The date and time the detail object was last modified Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Property
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Property Service Datatype Description Subnet registration properties are used to define various attributes of the [[SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail|detail objects]]. These properties are defined by the [[SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Property_Type]] objects, which describe the available value formats. Local createDate Type: dateTime id Unique ID of the property object Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime propertyTypeId The numeric ID of the related [[SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Property_Type|property type object]] Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Property_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Property_Type Service Datatype Description Subnet Registration Detail Property Type objects describe the nature of a [[SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Property]] object. These types use [http://php.net/pcre.pattern.php Perl-Compatible Regular Expressions] to validate the value of a property object. Local createDate Type: dateTime id Unique numeric ID of the property type object Type: integer keyName Code-friendly string name of the property type Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Type Service Datatype Description Subnet Registration Detail Type objects describe the nature of a [[SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail]] object. The standard values for these objects are as follows: NETWORK - The detail object represents the information for a [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet|subnet]] NETWORK6 - The detail object represents the information for an [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Version6|IPv6 subnet]] PERSON - The detail object represents the information for a customer with the RIR Local createDate Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Version4_Person_Default
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Version4_Person_Default Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail_Version4_Person_Default data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer RIR account. RIR account information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are assigned to the registry only and not to users belonging to the account. Local accountId The detail object's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id Type: integer createDate The date and time the detail object was created Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Reports_Request

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Rwhois_Handle
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Rwhois_Handle Datatype Description Provides a means of tracking handle identifiers at the various regional internet registries (RIRs). These objects are used by the [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration (type)|SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration]] objects to identify a customer or organization when a subnet is registered. Local accountId The handle object's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime handle The handle object's unique identifier as assigned by the RIR.

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account_Shipment data type contains information relating to a shipment. Basic information such as addresses, the shipment courier, and any tracking information for as shipment is accessible with this data type. Local accountId The account id of the shipment. Type: integer courierId The courier id of the shipment. Type: integer courierName The courier name of the shipment.

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment_Item Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account_Shipment_Item data type contains information relating to a shipment’s item. Basic information such as addresses, the shipment courier, and any tracking information for as shipment is accessible with this data type. Local createDate Type: dateTime description The description of the shipping item. Type: string id The unique id of the shipping item.

item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment_Tracking_Data Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account_Shipment_Tracking_Data data type contains information on a single piece of tracking information pertaining to a shipment. This tracking information tracking numbers by which the shipment may be tracked through the shipping courier. Local createUserId The create user id of the tracking data. Type: integer id The unique id of the tracking data. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency Service Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency data object represents a notification event being broadcast to the SoftLayer customer base. It is used to provide information regarding outages or current known issues. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature Local createDate The date this event was created. Type: dateTime device The device (if any) effected by this event.

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature Datatype Description Every SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency has a signatureId that references a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Signature data type. The signature is the user or group responsible for the current event. seeAlso SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency Local name The name or signature for the current Emergency Notification. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status Datatype Description Every SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency has a statusId that references a SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency_Status data type. The status is used to determine the current state of the event. seeAlso SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Notification_Emergency Local name A name describing the status of the current Emergency Notification. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier
item.description: SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Auxiliary_Shipping_Courier data type contains general information relating the different (major) couriers that SoftLayer may use for shipping. Local id The unique id of the shipping courier. Type: integer keyName The unique keyname of the shipping courier. Type: string name The name of the shipping courier. Type: string url The url to shipping courier's website.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency Service Datatype Description Local id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string Relational currentExchangeRate The current exchange rate Type: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_ExchangeRate Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Currency_Country data type maps what currencies are valid for specific countries. US Dollars are valid from any country, but other currencies are only available to customers in certain countries. Local countryId A unique identifier for the related country. Type: integer currencyId A unique identifier for the related currency. Type: integer id A unique identifier for a map between a country and currency.

Type: integer rate Type: decimal Relational fundingCurrency Type: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency localCurrency Type: SoftLayer_Billing_Currency Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Info
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Info Service Datatype Description Every SoftLayer customer account has billing specific information which is kept in the SoftLayer_Billing_Info data type. This information is used by the SoftLayer accounting group when sending invoices and making billing inquiries. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account::getBillingInfo Local accountId A SoftLayer account's identifier. Type: integer anniversaryDayOfMonth The day of the month that a SoftLayer customer is billed.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Info_Ach
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Info_Ach Datatype Description Local accountId Type: integer accountNumber Type: string accountType Type: string bankTransitNumber Type: string city Type: string country Type: string firstName Type: string id Type: integer lastName Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Info_Cycle
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Info_Cycle Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Info_Cycle data type models basic information concerning a SoftLayer account’s previous and current billing cycles. The information in this class is only populated for SoftLayer customers who are billed monthly. seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Info Local currentCycleEndDate The ending date of an account's current billing cycle. Type: dateTime currentCycleStartDate The starting date of an account's current billing cycle.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice data type contains general information relating to an individual invoice applied to a SoftLayer customer account. Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are taken from the account’s contact information at the time the invoice is generated. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice::getObject SoftLayer_Account::getInvoices seeAlso SoftLayer_Account (type) Local accountId The SoftLayer customer account that an invoice belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item Service Datatype Description Each billing invoice item makes up a record within an invoice. This provides you with a detailed record of everything related to an invoice item. When you are billed, our system takes active billing items and creates an invoice. These invoice items are a copy of your active billing items, and make up the contents of your invoice. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice Local associatedInvoiceItemId The associated invoice Item ID.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item_Hardware
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item_Hardware Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item_Hardware data type contains a “resource”. This resource is a link to the hardware tied to a SoftLayer_Billing_item whose category code is “server”. Local associatedInvoiceItemId The associated invoice Item ID. Type: integer billingItemId The billing item from which this invoice item was generated. Type: integer categoryCode The item category of the invoice item being invoiced.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item_Tax_Info
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item_Tax_Info Datatype Description Information about the tax rates that apply to a particular invoice item. Local createDate The date and time the tax information was recorded. Type: dateTime description The invoice description with special information about the invoice. Type: string effectiveTaxRate The tax rate that can be multiplied by the subtotal to get the Type: float

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Next
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Next Service Datatype Description Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Receivable_Payment
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Receivable_Payment Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Receivable_Payment data type contains general information relating to payments made against invoices. Local amount The amount of the payment. Type: decimal createDate The date of the payment. Type: dateTime invoiceId The invoice that the payment is for. Type: integer typeCode The type of payment. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Info
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Info Datatype Description Invoice tax information contains top-level information about the taxes recorded for a particular invoice. Local createDate The date and time this tax information was recorded. Type: dateTime currencyId The currency code that the invoice should be recorded in. Type: integer id The internal identifier for this invoice tax information. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Status Service Datatype Description The invoice tax status data type models a single status or state that an invoice can reflect in regard to an integration with a third-party tax calculation service. Local createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer keyName Type: string modifyDate Type: dateTime name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Type Service Datatype Description The invoice tax type data type models a single strategy for handling tax calculations. Local id A tax type's internal identifier. Each type of tax calculation strategy has a unique ID value. Type: integer keyName A unique string that identifies each strategy and is guaranteed to be stable over time. Type: string name A human-readable label for each tax strategy.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item Service Datatype Description Every individual item that a SoftLayer customer is billed for is recorded in the SoftLayer_Billing_Item data type. Billing items range from server chassis to hard drives to control panels, bandwidth quota upgrades and port upgrade charges. Softlayer [[SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice|invoices]] are generated from the cost of a customer’s billing items. Billing items are copied from the product catalog as they’re ordered by customers to create a reference between an account and the billable items they own.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Account_Media_Data_Transfer_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Account_Media_Data_Transfer_Request Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Account_Media_Data_Transfer_Request data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer billing item for a data transfer request. Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Association_History
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Association_History Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Association_History type keeps a record of which server billing items an “orphan” item has been associated with. Orphan billing items are billable items for secondary portable services (such as secondary subnets and StorageLayer accounts) that are not associated with a server and appear at the bottom of a SoftLayer invoice. The [[SoftLayer_Billing_Item::setAssociationId]] method allows you to associate these kinds of items with servers, making them appear as a child item of the server on your invoice.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Reason
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Reason Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Reason data type contains cancellation reasons. Local billingCancelReasonCategoryId A cancel reason category internal identifier. Type: integer id A reason internal identifier. Type: integer keyName A standardized reason internal identifier. Type: string reason The descriptoin of the reason Type: string Relational billingCancellationReasonCategory An billing cancellation reason category.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Reason_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Reason_Category Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Reason_Category data type contains cancellation reason categories. Local id A category internal identifier. Type: integer name The description of the category Type: string Relational billingCancellationReasons The corresponding billing cancellation reasons having the specific billing cancellation reason category. Type: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Reason[] Count billingCancellationReasonCount A count of the corresponding billing cancellation reasons having the specific billing cancellation reason category.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request data type is used to cancel service billing items. Local accountId The internal identifier of the customer account that a service cancellation record belongs to. Type: integer billingCancelReasonId The last modified date. Type: integer createDate The date that a cancellation request was created. Type: dateTime id A cancellation record's internal identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request_Item Datatype Description SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request_Item data type contains a billing item for cancellation. This data type is used to harness billing items to the associated service. Local billingItemId The internal identifier of a billing item Type: integer cancellationRequestId A cancellation request's internal identifier. Type: integer id A cancellation request item's internal identifier. Type: integer immediateCancellationFlag This flag indicated if a billing item should be canceled immediately or not.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request_Status Datatype Description SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Cancellation_Request_Status data type represents the status of a service cancellation request. Local description The short description of a cancellation request status Type: string id The internal identifier of a cancellation request status. Type: integer keyName status key name Type: string name The status name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Subnet
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Subnet Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Subnet data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer billing item whose item category code is one of the following: * pri_ip_address * static_sec_ip_addresses (static secondary) * sov_sec_ip_addresses (secondary on vlan, also known as “portable ips”) * sov_sec_ip_addresses_pub (sov_sec_ip_addresses public only) * sov_sec_ip_addresses_priv (sov_sec_ip_addresses private only) * sec_ip_addresses (old style, secondary ip addresses) These item categories denote that the billing item has subnet information attached.

item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_Dedicated_Rack Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_Dedicated_Rack data type models the billing information for a single bandwidth pooling. Bandwidth pooling members share their public bandwidth allocations, and incur overage charges instead of the overages on individual rack members. Virtual rack billing items are the parent items for all of it’s rack membership billing items. seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Item Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled.

SoftLayer_Billing_Order
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Order Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Order data type contains general information relating to an individual order applied to a SoftLayer customer account or to a new customer. Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are taken from the account’s contact information at the time the order is generated for existing SoftLayer customer. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Billing_Order::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Account (type) Local accountId The account ID to which an order belongs.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Cart
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Cart Service Datatype Description Local accountId Identification Number of the account record tied to the quote Type: integer completedPurchaseDataId Identification Number of the order record tied to the quote. Type: integer createDate Holds the date the quote record was created Type: dateTime expirationDate This property holds the date of expiration of a quote, after that date the quote would be deem expired Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Item Service Datatype Description Every individual item that a SoftLayer customer is billed for is recorded in the SoftLayer_Billing_Item data type. Billing items range from server chassis to hard drives to control panels, bandwidth quota upgrades and port upgrade charges. Softlayer [[SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice|invoices]] are generated from the cost of a customer’s billing items. Billing items are copied from the product catalog as they’re ordered by customers to create a reference between an account and the billable items they own.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Item_Category_Answer
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Item_Category_Answer Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Item_Category_Answer data type represents a single answer to an item category question. Local answer The answer to the question. Type: string createDate The date that the answer was created. Type: dateTime questionId The identifier for the question that the answer belongs to. Type: integer Relational orderItem The billing order item that the answer is for.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Note
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Note Datatype Description Local createDate Type: dateTime Relational employee Type: SoftLayer_User_Employee order Type: SoftLayer_Billing_Order Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Quote

Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are taken from the account’s contact information at the time the quote is generated for existing SoftLayer customer. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Quote::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Account (type) Local accountId Identification Number of the account record tied to the quote Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Oder_Type data type contains general information relating to all the different types of orders that exist. This data pertains only to where an order was generated from, from any of the SoftLayer websites with ordering interfaces or directly through the SoftLayer API. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Billing_Order::getType Local description A brief description of where a SoftLayer order originated from. Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest data type contains general information relating to attempted credit card information changes. Local accountId The account ID to which the credit card and billing information is associated with. Type: integer amount The total amount of the attempted transaction, represented in decimal format as US Dollars ($USD). Type: decimal billingAddressLine1 The physical street address.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Order
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Order Datatype Description Single storage group(array) used for a hardware server order. If a raid configuration is required this object will describe a single array that will be configured on the server. If the server requires more than one array, a storage group will need to be created for each array. Local arrayNumber Type: integer arraySize Type: decimal

Type: integer grow Flag to use all available space. Type: boolean hardDrivesString Comma delimited integers of drive indexes for the array.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition Service Datatype Description Configuration definition gives you details of the value that you’re setting. Some monitoring agents requires values unique to your system. If value type is defined as “Resource Specific Values”, you will have to make an additional API call to retrieve your system specific values. See [[SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent::getAvailableConfigurationValues|Monitoring Agent]] service to retrieve your system specific values. Local createDate Created date Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Common
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Common Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Common data type contains common information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This is an abstract class that serves as a base that more specialized classes will derive from. For example, a request class specific to SoftLayer Native IMS Login (username and password). Local securityQuestionAnswer The answer to your security question. Type: string securityQuestionId A security question you wish to answer when authenticating to the SoftLayer customer portal.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Contract
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Contract Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Contract provides a common set of operations for implementing classes. Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native data type contains information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This class is specific to the SoftLayer Native login (username/password). The request information will be verified to ensure it is valid, and then there will be an attempt to obtain a portal login token in authenticating the user with the provided information. Local password Your SoftLayer customer portal user's portal password.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native_External
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native_External Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native_External data type contains information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This class serves as a base class for more specialized external authentication classes to the SoftLayer Native login (username/password). Local password Your SoftLayer customer portal user's portal password. Type: string securityQuestionAnswer The answer to your security question. Type: string securityQuestionId A security question you wish to answer when authenticating to the SoftLayer customer portal.

This class provides information to allow the user to submit a request to the native SoftLayer (username/password) login service for a portal login token, as well as submitting a request to the TOTP 2 factor authentication service. item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration Datatype Description The hardware configuration container is used to provide configuration options for servers. Each configuration option will include both an itemPrice and a template. The itemPrice value will provide hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. The template will provide a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a server with the option.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration_Option
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration_Option Datatype Description An option found within a [[SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Configuration (type)]] structure. Local itemPrice Provides hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price preset Provides a description of a fixed configuration preset with monthly and hourly costs. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset template Provides a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a server with the option.

Type: integer customProvisionScriptUri The customer provision uri will be used to download and execute a customer defined script on the host at the end of provisioning.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Details
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Details Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Details data type contains information relating to a server’s component information, network information, and software information. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getObject Local components The components that belong to a piece of hardware. Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component[] networkComponents The network components that belong to a piece of hardware. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Component[] software The software that belong to a piece of hardware.

item.description: SoftLayer_Container_KnowledgeLayer_QuestionAnswer Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_KnowledgeLayer_QuestionAnswer models a single question and answer pair from SoftLayer’s KnowledgeLayer knowledge base. SoftLayer’s backend network interfaces with the KnowledgeLayer to recommend helpful articles when support tickets are created. External Links The SoftLayer Knowledge Layer associatedMethods SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject::getTopFiveKnowledgeLayerQuestions Local answer The answer to a question asked on the SoftLayer KnowledgeLayer. Type: string link The link to a question asked on the SoftLayer KnowledgeLayer.

Type: dateTime maxInstances The maximum number of guests hosted by this platform for the given day. Type: integer maxMemoryUsage The maximum amount of memory utilized by this platform for the given day.

Type: integer currentBillCycleEnd Current bill cycle end date. Type: dateTime currentBillCycleStart Current bill cycle start date. Type: dateTime lastInstanceCount The last count of instances this platform was hosting.

Type: dateTime graphError Error message encountered during graphing Type: string graphImage The raw PNG binary data to be displayed once the graph is drawn.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Authentication_Data
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Authentication_Data Datatype Description This object holds authentication data to a server. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getFtpAttrubutes Local host The name of a host Type: string password The authentication password Type: string port The port number Type: integer type The type of network protocol. This can be ftp, ssh and so on. Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Bandwidth_Data_Summary Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_Bandwidth_Data_Summary models an interface’s overall bandwidth usage during it’s current billing cycle. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getPublicBandwidthDataSummary SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getPrivateBandwidthDataSummary Local allowedUsage The amount of bandwidth a server has allocated to it in it's current billing period. Type: float estimatedUsage The amount of bandwidth that a server has used within it's current billing period. Type: float projectedUsage The amount of bandwidth a server is projected to use within its billing period, based on it's current usage.

Type: float outgoingAmount The amount of outgoing bandwidth that a server has used within the hour of the recordedDate. Type: float recordedDate The date and time that the bandwidth was used by a piece of hardware Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Directory
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Directory Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Directory represents a token authentication directory on your CDN FTP or on your origin server. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getAuthenticationDirectories Local createDate The date that a token authentication directory was created. Type: dateTime name The name of a directory or a file within a directory listing. Type: string type The type of platform that a token authentication directory is defined for.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Parameter
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_Parameter Datatype Description This container is used for CDN content authentication service. External Links CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::authenticateResourceRequest seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Local cdnAccountName A CDN account name Type: string clientIp A client IP address Type: string referrer A client referrer information Type: string sourceUrl A source URL Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_ServiceEndpoint
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_ServiceEndpoint Datatype Description CDN supports the content authentication service. With the content authentication service, customers can control access to their contents. There are several scenarios where this authentication capability could be useful. Websites can prevent other rogue websites from linking to their videos. Content owners can prevent users from passing around http links, thus forcing them to login to view contents. It is also possible to authenticate via the client IP address.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_PointsOfPresence_Summary
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_PointsOfPresence_Summary Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_PointsOfPresence_Summary models an individual CDN point of presence’s bandwidth usage for a CDN account within a given date range. CDN POPs are located throughout the world, so individual POP usage may be beneficial in determining who is downloading your CDN hosted content. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getPopNames Local bandwidth The amount of bandwidth used by a CDN POP. Type: unsigned long

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary models a CDN account’s overall bandwidth usage and overages within a given date range. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getBandwidthOverage Local cdnAccountId The CDN account id Type: integer endDateTime The ending date of a CDN bandwidth summary. Type: dateTime fileName The name of a file that is requested by visitors Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary_Detail
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary_Detail Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Bandwidth_Summary_File models a CDN account’s overall bandwidth usage and overages within a given date range. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getDetailedBandwidth Local cdnAccountId The CDN account id Type: integer duration The duration of a file that is viewed. Type: float endDateTime The ending date of a CDN bandwidth summary. Type: dateTime fileName The file name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_OriginPull_Mapping
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_OriginPull_Mapping Datatype Description SoftLayer’s CDN allows for multiple origin pull domains and CNAME records. This container holds the origin pull configuration details. CDN currently supports origin pull method for HTTP content. External Links CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getOriginPullMappingInformation seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Local cname The CNAME record. Type: string id The unique identifier of an origin pull configuration Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence Datatype Description SoftLayer’s CDN content delivery network offering replicates your data to a number of Points of Presence (POP’s) around the world. SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence models one of these POP locations. External Links CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getBandwidthOverage SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getPopNames seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Local id A CDN Point of Presence's internal identifier. Type: integer name A CDN Point of Presence's name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PurgeService_Response
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PurgeService_Response Datatype Description This container holds information on a purge request. [[SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::purgeCache|Purge method]] for more details. Status code can be “SUCCESS”, “FAILED”, or “INVALID_URL” “INVALID_URL” code is returned when a URL is malformed or does not belong to customer. “FAILED” is returned in case there was an internal error. External Links CDN Services at softlayer.com associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::purgeCache Local statusCode A status code indicates whether your request was successful or not Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Report_Usage
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Report_Usage Datatype Description Local applicationDeliveryNetwork Type: float applicationDeliveryNetworkSsl Type: float diskSpace Type: float endDate Type: dateTime flash Type: float http Type: float httpSmall Type: float https Type: float httpsSmall Type: float

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_SupportedProtocol
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_SupportedProtocol Datatype Description SoftLayer’s CDN content delivery network allows for multiple types of media hosting in addition to traditional HTTP hosting. Each of these media types are accessible form a different URL. SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_SupportedProtocol holds details about CDN supported media types and their associated URLs. CDN media URLs follow the standard ://..cdn.softlayer.net Flash streaming, Windows Media streaming and HTTP protocols are supported: Flash streaming: rtmp://.flash.cdn.softlayer.net Windows Media streaming: mms://.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Directory_Listing
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Directory_Listing Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Network_Directory_Listing represents a single entry in a listing of files within a remote directory. API methods that return remote directory listings typically return arrays of SoftLayer_Container_Network_Directory_Listing objects. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_ContentDelivery_Account::getDirectoryListing Local fileCount If the file in a directory listing is a directory itself then fileCount is the number of files within the directory. Type: integer name The name of a directory or a file within a directory listing.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Event Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_Event object stores information about individual intrusion protection events. It is a data container that cannot be edited, deleted, or saved. It is returned by many methods in the TippingPointReporting object, but never directly, always as a child of another container object. Local CVEId The CVE ID(s), if any, associated with this attack signature. Type: string actionTaken The action that was taken when this attack was discovered.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_Statistic is used exclusively by the getMainStatistics method on the TippingPointReporting service, and serves mainly as a pair object, storing a name and an attack count. Name is usually the name of an attack, but it can also be an attacking IP Address Local attackCount The number of attacks effecting this name over the time period Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistics
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistics Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_Statistics Type is used as a container for SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic objects. The SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistics class holds the “header” information, like the item being queried (either account or data center), the time frame, and the grand total of the attacks. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_TippingPointReporting::getMainStatistics Local target The actual target, either a datacenter name, an account ID, or a subnet IP Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_SubnetReport
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_SubnetReport Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_SubnetReport object is the container that holds the SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Event objects for a particular subnet, or “All Subnets”, whatever the case may be. Subnet, subnet mask, direction, and the individual events are returned by this object. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_TippingPointReporting::getSubnetReportForEntireAccount SoftLayer_Network_TippingPointReporting::getReportForIpAddressOrSubnet SoftLayer_Network_TippingPointReporting::drillDownAttack Local cidr cidr for this report. If the subnetIpAddress is "All Subnets", this is set to 32 and should be ignored.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_LoadBalancer_StatusEntry
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_LoadBalancer_StatusEntry Datatype Description The LoadBalancer_StatusEntry object stores information about the current status of a particular load balancer service. It is a data container that cannot be edited, deleted, or saved. It is returned exclusively by the getStatus method on the [[SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer_Service]] service Local content The value of the entry. Type: string label Text description of the status entry Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Media_Information

item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Storage_Evault_Vault_Task Datatype Description SoftLayer’s StorageLayer Evault services provides details regarding the the purchased vault. When a job is created using the Webcc Console, the job created is identified as a task on the vault. Using this service, information regarding the task can be retrieved. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup_Evault::getBackupJobDetails SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup_Evault::getRestoreJobDetails SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup_Evault::getAgentStatuses seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Storage Local id Unique identifier for the task. (provided only for backup jobs) Type: unsigned long description Description of the backup/restore job Type: string hardwareId hardware id Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Subnet_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Subnet_IpAddress Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Subnet_IPAddress models an IP v4 address as it exists as a member of it’s subnet, letting the user know if it is a network identifier, gateway, broadcast, or useable address. Addresses that are neither the network identifier nor the gateway nor the broadcast addresses are usable by SoftLayer servers. External Links Ip address at Wikipedia RFC791:Internet Protocol Specification at ietf.org associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getRoutableEndpointIpAddresses seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Subnet

Type: string categoryId The product item category id. Type: integer questionId The product item category question id.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Item_Discount_Program
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Item_Discount_Program Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Product_Item_Discount_Program data type represents the information about a discount that is related to a specific product item. Local applicableQuantity The number of times the item discount(s) may be applied for that order container. At a minimum the number will be 1 and at most, it will match the quantity of the order container. Type: integer item The product item that the discount applies to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order Datatype Description This is the datatype that needs to be populated and sent to SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder. This datatype has everything required to place an order with SoftLayer. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Product_Order::verifyOrder SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder Local bigDataOrderFlag Flag for identifying an order for Big Data Deployment. Type: boolean billingInformation Billing Information associated with an order. For existing customers this information is completely ignored.

The SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Attribute_Address datatype contains the address information. Local addressLine1 The physical street address. Type: string addressLine2 The second line in the address. Information such as suite number goes here. Type: string city The city name Type: string countryCode The 2-character Country code.

Type: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order[] subnets The list of private [[SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Subnet|subnets]] available for ordering with a description of their available IP space.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Storage_Modification
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Storage_Modification Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Storage_Modification datatype has everything required to place a modification to an existing StorageLayer account with SoftLayer. Modifications, at present time, include upgrade and downgrades only. The “volumeId” property must be set to the network storage volume id to be upgraded. Once populated send this container to the [[SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder]] method. The “packageId” property passed in for CloudLayer storage accounts must be set to 0 (zero) and the “quantity” property must be set to 1.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Receipt
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Receipt Datatype Description When an order is placed (SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder), a receipt is returned when the order is created successfully. The information in the receipt helps explain information about the order. It’s order ID, and all the data within the order as well. For PayPal Orders, an URL is also returned to the user so that the user can complete the transaction. Users paying with PayPal must continue on to this URL, login and pay.

If the contact is not provided the technical contact will be used. If the address is not provided the organization information address will be used.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Referral_Partner_Prospect
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Referral_Partner_Prospect Datatype Description Local address1 Type: string address2 Type: string city Type: string companyName Type: string country Type: string email Type: string firstName Type: string lastName Type: string officePhone Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorSpeed
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorSpeed Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorSpeed contains graphs to display speed for each of the server’s fans. Fan speeds are gathered from the server’s remote management card. Local graph The graph to display the server's fan speed. Type: binary data title A title that may be used to display for the graph. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorTemperature
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorTemperature Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_Graphs_SensorTemperature contains graphs to display the cpu(s) and system temperatures retrieved from the management card using thermometer graphs. Local graph The graph to display the server's cpu(s) and system temperatures. Type: binary data title A title that may be used to display for the graph. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_PmInfo
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_PmInfo Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_PmInfo contains pminfo information retrieved from a server’s remote management card. Local pmInfoId PmInfo ID Type: string pmInfoReading PmInfo Reading Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReading
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReading Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReadings contains sensor information retrieved from a server’s remote management card. Local lowerCritical Lower Non-Recoverable threshold Type: string lowerNonCritical Lower Non-Critical threshold Type: string lowerNonRecoverable Lower Non-Recoverable threshold Type: string sensorId Sensor ID Type: string sensorReading Sensor Reading Type: string sensorUnits Sensor Units Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReadingsWithGraphs
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReadingsWithGraphs Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_RemoteManagement_SensorReadingsWithGraphs contains the raw data retrieved from a server’s remote management card. Along with the raw data, two sets of graphs will be returned. One set of graphs is used to display, using thermometer graphs, the temperatures (cpu(s) and system) retrieved from the management card. The other set is used to display speed for each of the server’s fans. Local rawData The raw data returned from the server's remote management card.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Resource_Metadata_ServiceResource
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Resource_Metadata_ServiceResource Datatype Description The metadata service resource container is used to store information about a single service resource. Local backendIpAddress The backend IP address for this resource Type: string type The type for this resource Type: SoftLayer_Network_Service_Resource_Type

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType Datatype Description This data type is a container that stores information about a single indexed object type. Object type information can be used for discovery of searchable data and for creation or validation of object index search strings. Each of these containers holds a collection of [[SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType_Property (type)|SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType_Property]] objects, specifying which object properties are exposed for the current user. Refer to the the documentation for the [[SoftLayer_Search/search|search()]] method for information on using object types in search strings.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType_Property
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType_Property Datatype Description This data type is a container that stores information about a single property of a searchable object type. Each [[SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType (type)|SoftLayer_Container_Search_ObjectType]] object holds a collection of these properties. Property information can be used for discovery of searchable data and for the creation or validation of object index search strings. Note that properties are only understood by the [[SoftLayer_Search/advancedSearch|advancedSearch()]] method. Refer to the advancedSearch() method for information on using properties in search strings.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Search_Result
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Search_Result Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Search_Result data type represents a result row from an execution of Search service. Local matchedTerms An array of terms that were matched in the resource object. Type: array of strings relevanceScore The score ratio of the result for relevance to the search criteria. Type: decimal resource A search results resource object that matched search criteria.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Software_Component_HostIps_Policy
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Software_Component_HostIps_Policy Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Software_Component_HostIps_Policy container holds the title and value of a current host ips policy. Local policy The value of a host ips category. Type: string policyTitle The category title of a host ips policy. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Cache
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Cache Datatype Description These are the results of a tax calculation. The tax calculation was kicked off but allowed to run in the background. This type stores the results so that an interface can be updated with up-to-date information. Local effectiveTaxRate The percentage of the final total that should be tax. Type: decimal items The container that holds the four actual tax rates, one for each fee type.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Cache_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Cache_Item Datatype Description This represents one order item in a tax calculation. Local categoryCode The category code for the referenced product. Type: string containerHash This hash will match to the hash on an order container. Type: string itemPriceId The reference to the price for this order item. Type: integer taxRates This is the container containing the individual tax rates.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Rates
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Tax_Rates Datatype Description This contains the four tax rates, one for each fee type. Local laborTaxRate The tax rate associated with the labor fee. Type: decimal locationId A reference to a location. Type: decimal oneTimeTaxRate The tax rate associated with the one-time fee. Type: decimal recurringTaxRate The tax rate associated with the recurring fee.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_GraphInputs
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_GraphInputs Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_GraphInputs models a single inbound object for a given ticket graph. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Utility_Ticket_Graph::getTicketImage SoftLayer_Utility_Ticket_Graph::getTicketGraphParameters seeAlso SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_GraphOutputs Local endDate This is a unix timestamp that represents the stop date/time for a graph. Type: dateTime networkInterfaceId The front-end or back-end network uplink interface associated with this server. Type: integer pod * Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_GraphOutputs
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_GraphOutputs Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_GraphOutputs models a single outbound object for a given bandwidth graph. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Utility_Ticket_Graph::getTicketImage SoftLayer_Utility_Ticket_Graph::getTicketGraphParameters seeAlso SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_GraphInputs Local graphImage The raw PNG binary data to be displayed once the graph is drawn. Type: binary data graphTitle The title that ended up being displayed as part of the graph image. Type: string maxEndDate The maximum date included in this graph.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_Priority
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_Priority Datatype Description Local name Type: string value Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_Survey_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Ticket_Survey_Preference Datatype Description Local applicable Type: boolean optedOut Type: boolean optedOutDate Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Authentication_Token
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Authentication_Token Datatype Description Container class used to hold user authentication token Local hash hash that gets populated for user authentication Type: string user the user authenticated object Type: SoftLayer_User_Customer userId the id of the user to authenticate Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding Datatype Description Container classed used to hold external authentication information Local authenticationToken The unique token that is created by an external authentication request. Type: string openIdConnectAccessToken The OpenID Connect access token which provides access to a resource by the OpenID Connect provider. Type: string openIdConnectAccountId The account to login to, if not provided a default will be used.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone Datatype Description Container classed used to hold portal token Local authenticationToken The unique token that is created by an external authentication request. Type: string openIdConnectAccessToken The OpenID Connect access token which provides access to a resource by the OpenID Connect provider. Type: string openIdConnectAccountId The account to login to, if not provided a default will be used.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone_Mode
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone_Mode Datatype Description This container can be used to configure the phone authentication mode. By default, “VOICE_CALL” in “STANDARD” mode with no Pin number will be used. With the default mode, you will have to answer a phone call from a trusted 2 form factor vendor during authentication process. You have to answer the call and follow the instruction in order to complete the authentication. You can also use SMS text message or PhoneFactor mobile app modes (in case you’re using PhoneFactor).

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Data_Phone
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Data_Phone Datatype Description This container holds user’s phone information. Local countryCode Country code number for the phone number Default: 1 (United States & Canada +1) Type: integer extension Phone extension code. It can be digits, commas, *, and # are allowed. Type: string phone Phone number can be a mobile phone number, desk phone number, or some other option.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment Datatype Description At times,such as when attaching files to tickets, it is necessary to send files to SoftLayer API methods. The SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment data type models a single file to upload to the API. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Ticket::addAttachedFile Local data The contents of a file that is uploaded to the SoftLayer API. Type: binary data filename The name of a file that is uploaded to the SoftLayer API.

Type: string friendlyName The friendly name of a file as it exists on the file server. Type: string modifyDate The date the file was last modified on the file server.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity data type models a single entity on a storage resource. Entities can include anything within a storage volume including files, folders, directories, and CloudLayer storage projects. External Links Internet media type at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Storage::uploadFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::downloadFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getAllFiles SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getFileByIdentifier SoftLayer_Network_Storage::restoreFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getFilesPendingDelete SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getRecycleBinFileByIdentifier Local content A file entity's raw content. Type: binary data contentType A file entity's MIME content type.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status Datatype Description SoftLayer customer servers that are purchased with the Microsoft Windows operating system are configured by default to retrieve updates from SoftLayer’s local Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) server. Periodically, these servers synchronize and check for new updates from their local WSUS server. SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status models the results of a server’s last synchronization attempt as queried from SoftLayer’s WSUS servers. External Links Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) Home associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getWindowsUpdateStatus seeAlso SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem Local lastRebootDate The last time a server rebooted due to a Windows Update.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem models a single Microsoft Update as reported by SoftLayer’s private Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) services. All servers purchased with Microsoft Windows retrieve updates from SoftLayer’s WSUS servers by default. External Links Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) Home Microsoft Help and Support associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getWindowsUpdateAvailableUpdates SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getWindowsUpdateInstalledUpdates seeAlso SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status Local description A short description of a Microsoft Windows Update.

Local actions The valid actions for use with rules. Type: array of strings maximumRuleCount Maximum allowed number of rules. Type: integer protocols The valid protocols for use with rules. Type: array of strings sourceIpSubnetMasks The valid source ip subnet masks for use with rules.
