item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Network_Subnet_Mask_Generic_Detail Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Network_Subnet_Mask_Generic_Detail data type contains information relating to a subnet mask and details associated with that object. Local cidr The subnet cidr prefix. Type: string description The subnet mask description. Type: string mask The subnet mask. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_DedicatedHost_AllocationStatus
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_DedicatedHost_AllocationStatus Datatype Description This data type represents the structure to hold the allocation properties of a [[SoftLayer_Virtual_DedicatedHost]]. Local cpuAllocated Number of allocated CPU cores on the specified dedicated host. Type: integer cpuAvailable Number of available CPU cores on the specified dedicated host. Type: integer cpuCount Total number of CPU cores on the dedicated host. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Configuration Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Configuration data type contains information relating to a template’s external location for importing and exporting associatedMethods SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Group::createFromExternalSource Local bootMode Optional virtualization boot mode parameter, if set, can mark a template to boot specifically into PV or HVM. Type: string byol Specifies if image is using a customer's software license. Type: boolean cloudInit Specifies if image requires cloud-init.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration Datatype Description The guest configuration container is used to provide configuration options for creating computing instances. Each configuration option will include both an itemPrice and a template. The itemPrice value will provide hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. The template will provide a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a computing instance with the option.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration_Option
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration_Option Datatype Description An option found within a [[SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_Guest_Configuration (type)]] structure. Local flavor Provides a description of a pre-defined configuration with monthly and hourly costs. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset itemPrice Provides hourly and monthly costs (if either are applicable), and a description of the option. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price template Provides a fragment of the request with the properties and values that must be sent when creating a computing instance with the option.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Dns_Domain data type represents a single DNS domain record hosted on the SoftLayer nameservers. Domains contain general information about the domain name such as name and serial. Individual records such as A, AAAA, CTYPE, and MX records are stored in the domain’s associated [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord (type)|SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord]] records. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account::getDomains SoftLayer_Dns_Domain::getObject SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord::getDomain seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord (type) SoftLayer_Dns_Secondary (type) Local id A domain record's internal identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Forward
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Forward Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Forward data type represents a single DNS domain record hosted on the SoftLayer nameservers. Domains contain general information about the domain name such as name and serial. Individual records such as A, AAAA, CTYPE, and MX records are stored in the domain’s associated [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord (type)|SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord]] records. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account::getDomains SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Forward::getObject Local id A domain record's internal identifier. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration data type represents a domain registration record. External Links Domain Name Registry at Wikipedia seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration_Status Local createDate Type: dateTime domainRegistrationStatusId Type: integer expireDate The date that the domain registration will expire. Type: dateTime id A domain record's internal identifier. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration_Registrant_Verification_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration_Registrant_Verification_Status Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration_Registrant_Verification_Status models the state of the registrant. Here are the following status codes: *“‘Admin Reviewing”’: The registrant data has been submitted and being reviewed by compliance team. *“‘Pending”’: The verification process has been inititated, and verification email will be sent. *“‘Suspended”’: The registrant has failed verification and the domain has been suspended. *“‘Verified”’: The registrant has been validated. *“‘Verifying”’: The verification process has been initiated and is waiting for registrant response.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration_Status Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration_Status models the state of domain name. Here are the following status codes: *“‘Active”’: This domain name is active. *“‘Pending Owner Approval”’: Pending owner approval for completion of transfer. *“‘Pending Admin Review”’: Pending admin review for transfer. *“‘Pending Registry”’: Pending registry for transfer. *“‘Expired”’: Domain name has expired. seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Registration Local description The description of the domain registration status names.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord data type represents a single resource record entry in a SoftLayer hosted domain. Each resource record contains a “host” and “data” property, defining a resource’s name and it’s target data. Domains contain multiple types of resource records. The “type” property separates out resource records by type. “Type” can take one of the following values: * “‘“a”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_AType|address]] records * “‘“aaaa”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_AaaaType|address]] records * “‘“cname”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_CnameType|canonical name]] records * “‘“mx”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_MxType|mail exchanger]] records * “‘“ns”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_NsType|name server]] records * “‘“ptr”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_PtrType|pointer]] records in reverse domains * “‘“soa”“’ for a domain’s [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SoaType|start of authority]] record * “‘“spf”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SpfType|sender policy framework]] records * “‘“srv”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SrvType|service]] records * “‘“txt”“’ for [[SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_TxtType|text]] records

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_AType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_AType Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_AType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “a” and defines a DNS A record on a SoftLayer hosted domain. An A record directs a host name to an IP address. For instance if the A record for “host.example.org” points to the IP address 10.0.0.1 then the “host” property for the A record equals “host” and the “data” property equals “10.0.0.1”.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_AaaaType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_AaaaType Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_AaaaType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “aaaa” and defines a DNS AAAA record on a SoftLayer hosted domain. An AAAA record directs a host name to an IPv6 address. For instance if the AAAA record for “host.example.org” points to the IPv6 address “fe80:0:0:0:0:0:a00:0” then the “host” property for the AAAA record equals “host” and the “data” property equals “fe80:0:0:0:0:0:a00:0”.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_CnameType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_CnameType Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_CnameType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “cname” and defines a DNS CNAME record on a SoftLayer hosted domain. A CNAME record directs a host name to another host. For instance, if the CNAME record for “alias.example.org” points to the host “host.example.org” then the “host” property equals “alias” and the “data” property equals “host.example.org.”. DNS entries defined by CNAME should not be used as the data field for an MX record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_MxType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_MxType Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_MxType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “mx” and used to describe MX resource records. MX records control which hosts are responsible as mail exchangers for a domain. For instance, in the domain example.org, an MX record whose host is “@” and data is “mail” says that the host “mail.example.org” is responsible for handling mail for example.org. That means mail sent to users @example.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_NsType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_NsType Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_NsType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “ns” and defines a DNS NS record on a SoftLayer hosted domain. An NS record defines the authoritative name server for a domain. All SoftLayer hosted domains contain NS records for “ns1.softlayer.com” and “ns2.softlayer.com” . For instance, if example.org is hosted on ns1.softlayer.com, then example.org contains an NS record whose “host” property equals “@” and whose “data” property equals “ns1.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_PtrType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_PtrType Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_PtrType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “ptr” and defines a reverse DNS PTR record on the SoftLayer name servers. The format for a reverse DNS PTR record varies based on whether it is for an IPv4 or IPv6 address. For an IPv4 address the “host” property for every PTR record is the last octet of the IP address that the PTR record belongs to, while the “data” property is the canonical name of the host that the reverse lookup resolves to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SoaType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SoaType Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SoaType defines a domains’ Start of Authority (or SOA) resource record. A domain’s SOA record contains a domain’s general and propagation information. Every domain must have one SOA record, and it is not possible to remove a domain’s SOA record. SOA records typically contain a domain’s serial number, but the SoftLayer API associates a domain’s serial number directly with it’s SoftLayer_Dns_Domain record. seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SpfType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SpfType Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SpfType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “spf” and defines a DNS SPF record on a SoftLayer hosted domain. An SPF record provides sender policy framework data for a host. For instance, if defining the SPF record “v=spf1 mx:mail.example.org ~all” for “host.example.org”. then the “host” property equals “host” and the “data” property equals “v=spf1 mx:mail.example.org ~all”. SPF records are commonly used in email verification methods such as Sender Policy Framework.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SrvType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SrvType Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SrvType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “srv” and defines a DNS SRV record on a SoftLayer hosted domain. External Links SRV Record at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_SrvType::createObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord Local data The value of a domain's resource record. This can be an IP address or a hostname.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_TxtType
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_TxtType Datatype Description SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_TxtType is a SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord object whose “type” property is set to “txt” and defines a DNS TXT record on a SoftLayer hosted domain. A TXT record provides a text description for a host. For instance, if defining the TXT record “My test host” for “host.example.org”. then the “host” property equals “host” and the “data” property equals “My test host”. TXT records are commonly used in email verification methods such as Sender Policy Framework.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Reverse
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Reverse Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Reverse data type represents a reverse IP address record. External Links Reverse DNS lookup at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Vlan::getReverseDomainRecords SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getReverseDomainRecords SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getReverseDomainRecords seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_PtrType Local id A domain record's internal identifier. Type: integer name A domain's name including top-level domain, for example "example.com". Type: string

External Links Reverse DNS lookup at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Vlan::getReverseDomainRecords SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getReverseDomainRecords SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getReverseDomainRecords seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_PtrType Local id A domain record's internal identifier. Type: integer name A domain's name including top-level domain, for example "example.com". Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Reverse_Version6
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Reverse_Version6 Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_Reverse_Version6 data type represents a reverse IPv6 address record. External Links Reverse DNS lookup at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Vlan::getReverseDomainRecords SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getReverseDomainRecords SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getReverseDomainRecords seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord SoftLayer_Dns_Domain_ResourceRecord_PtrType Local id A domain record's internal identifier. Type: integer name A domain's name including top-level domain, for example "example.com". Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Message
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Message Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Dns_Message data type contains information for a single message generated by the SoftLayer DNS system. SoftLayer_Dns_Messages are typically created during the secondary DNS transfer process. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Dns_Secondary::getErrorMessages seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Secondary Local createDate The date the message was created. Type: dateTime id The internal identifier for a DNS message. Type: integer message The message text.

item.title: SoftLayer_Dns_Secondary
item.description: SoftLayer_Dns_Secondary Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Dns_Secondary data type contains information on a single secondary DNS zone which is managed through SoftLayer’s zone transfer service. Domains created via zone transfer may not be modified by the SoftLayer portal or API. External Links DNS Zone Transfer at Wikipedia. Secondary Domains at KnowledgeLayer associatedMethods SoftLayer_Dns_Secondary::getObject SoftLayer_Dns_Domain::getSecondary SoftLayer_Account::getSecondaryDomains seeAlso SoftLayer_Dns_Domain Local createDate The date a secondary DNS record was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Attribute type contains general information for a hardware attribute. Hardware attributes can be assigned to specific hardware objects to describe relatively arbitrary information. Local hardwareAttributeTypeId The unique identifier of a hardware attribute's type. Type: integer id A hardware attribute's unique identifier. Type: integer value A hardware attribute's value. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Attribute_Type

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Chassis
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Chassis Datatype Description Every piece of hardware in SoftLayer’s datacenters, including customer servers, are housed in one of many hardware chassis. Type: integer id A hardware chassis' internal identifier. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Attribute data type contains general information relating to a single hardware setting or attribute for a component model. For Example: A RAID controller may be setup for many different RAID configurations. A RAID controller with a configuration of RAID-1 will have a single attribute for this RAID setting. Local hardwareComponentAttributeTypeId A hardware component attribute's associated [[SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Attribute_Type|type]] Id. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer component model. A component model represents a vendor specific representation of a hardware component. Every piece of hardware on a server will have a specific hardware component model. Local architectureTypeId Type: string capacity A component model's capacity. The capacity of a component model depends on the model itself.

item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Architecture_Type Datatype Description Local id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string parentId Type: string Relational children Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Architecture_Type[] parent Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Architecture_Type Count childrenCount A count of Type: unsignedLong

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component__Model_Attribute data type contains general information relating to a single hardware setting or attribute for a component model. Local attributeTypeId A hardware component model attribute's associated [[SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Attribute_Type|type]] Id. Type: integer hardwareComponentModelId A hardware component model attribute's associated [[SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model|hardware component model]] Id. Type: integer value A hardware component model attribute's value. A value can have many different values depending on the attributes [[SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Attribute_Type|type]].

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Attribute_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Attribute_Type data type contains general information for the type of an attribute for a hardware component model. Local description The description for the data that a hardware component model type's [[SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Attribute|Attribute]] contains. Type: string id A hardware component model attribute type's Id. Type: integer keyName A hardware component model attribute type's unique name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer generic component model. A generic component model represents a non-vendor specific representation of a hardware component. Frequently SoftLayer utilizes components from various vendors in the servers they provision. For Example: Several different vendors produce 6GB DDR2 memory. The generic component model for the 6GB stick of RAM encompasses every instance of this component regardless of make and model.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_Attribute data type contains information relating to a single SoftLayer generic component model. Generic component model attributes can hold any information to describe functionality of the model. For Example: The number of cores that a processor has. Local value A generic component model attribute's value. Type: string Relational hardwareGenericComponentModel An attributes generic component model. Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_MarketingFeature
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_MarketingFeature Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic_MarketingFeature data type contains general information relating to all the advertising features of a single SoftLayer hardware generic component model. Local features An html formatted list of all features. Type: string price A hardware component's upgrade price. Type: string Relational hardwareGenericComponentModel The generic component model for a list of advertising or marketing features Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model_Generic

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Motherboard
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Motherboard Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_DriveController data type abstracts information related to a motherboard. Local hardwareComponentModelId The internal identifier of a hardware component's component model. Type: integer hardwareId The internal identifier of the hardware that a hardware component resides inside. Type: integer id A hardware component's internal identifier. Type: integer modifyDate The date that a hardware component was last modified.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Motherboard_Reboot_Time
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Motherboard_Reboot_Time Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Motherboard_Reboot_Time contains the average reboot times for motherboards. There are two types of average times. One is for motherboards without raid, and the other is for motherboards with raid. These times are based on averages and have been gathered through numerous test cases. Local withRaid Average reboot time in seconds for the motherboard when raid is installed. Type: integer

Type: integer hardwareId The internal identifier of the hardware that a hardware component resides inside. Type: integer id A hardware component's internal identifier. Type: integer modifyDate The date that a hardware component was last modified.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition data type contains general information relating to a single hard drive partition. Local diskNumber A hardware component partition's order in the [[SoftLayer_Hardware_Hardware|hardware]]. Type: integer grow A flag indicating if a partition is the grow partition. The grow partition will grow to fill all remaining space on a disk. There can only be one. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_OperatingSystem
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_OperatingSystem Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_OperatingSystem data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer Operating System Partition Template. Local description A partition template operating system's description. Typically the title of the Operating System. Type: string id A partition template operating system's id. Type: integer notes Information about the kinds of partition templates assigned to this operating system.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer partition template. Partition templates group 1 or more partition configurations that can be used to predefine how a hard drive’s partitions will be configured. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template::getData SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template::getPartitionTemplatePartition Local accountId A partition template's owner. The [[SoftLayer_Account|Account]] that a template was created by. Type: integer description A partition template's description.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template_Partition
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template_Partition Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template_Partition data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer Template Partition. Local id A partition's id. Type: integer isGrow A flag indication if a partition will be the grow partition. The grow partition will have its size adjusted to fill all available space on a hard drive. Type: boolean partitionName A partition's default name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Evault_Version6 contains the names of the remote management commands. Currently, only the reboot and power commands for the remote management card exist. Local keyName The name of the remote management command. Type: string Relational requests All requests issued for the remote management command. Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command_Request[] Count requestCount A count of all requests issued for the remote management command.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command_Request Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_RemoteManagement_Command_Request contains details for remote management commands issued to a server’s remote management card. Details for remote management commands such as powerOn, powerOff, powerCycle, rebootDefault, rebootSoft, rebootHard can be retrieved. Details such as the user who issued the command, the id of the remote management card the command was issued, when the command was issued may be retrieved. Local createDate The timestamp the remote management command was issued.

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Status Datatype Description SoftLayer_Hardware_Status models the inventory state of any piece of hardware in SoftLayer’s inventory. Most of these statuses are used by SoftLayer while a server is not provisioned or undergoing provisioning. SoftLayer uses the following status codes: *“‘ACTIVE”’: This server is active and in use. *“‘DEPLOY”’: Used during server provisioning. *“‘DEPLOY2”’: Used during server provisioning. *“‘MACWAIT”’: Used during server provisioning. *“‘RECLAIM”’: This server has been reclaimed by SoftLayer and is awaiting de-provisioning.

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone Service Datatype Description Each User is assigned a timezone allowing for a precise local timestamp. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer::getTimezone seeAlso SoftLayer_User_Customer Local id A timezone's identifying number. Type: integer longName A timezone's long name. For example, "(GMT-06:00) America/Dallas - CST". Type: string name A timezone's name. For example, "America/Dallas". Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Location
item.description: SoftLayer_Location Service Datatype Description Every piece of hardware and network connection owned by SoftLayer is tracked physically by location and stored in the SoftLayer_Location data type. SoftLayer locations exist in parent/child relationships, a convenient way to track equipment from it’s city, datacenter, server room, rack, then slot. Network backbones are tied to datacenters only, not to a room, rack, or slot. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getLocation SoftLayer_Hardware::getDatacenter SoftLayer_Network_Backbone::getLocation Local id The unique identifier of a specific location.

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include datacenter-specific properties. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getDatacenter SoftLayer_Location::getDatacenters seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer

item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group Service Datatype Description Local description Type: string id Type: integer locationGroupTypeId Type: integer name Type: string securityLevelId Type: integer Relational locationGroupType The type for this location group. Type: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Type locations The locations in a group. Type: SoftLayer_Location[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Location_CrossReference
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Location_CrossReference Datatype Description Local id Type: integer locationGroupId Type: integer locationId Type: integer priority If set, this is the priority of this cross reference record in the group. Type: integer Relational location Type: SoftLayer_Location locationGroup Type: SoftLayer_Location_Group Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Pricing Service Datatype Description Local description Type: string id Type: integer locationGroupTypeId Type: integer name Type: string securityLevelId Type: integer Relational locationGroupType The type for this location group. Type: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Type locations The locations that this pricing location group is applicable for.

item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Regional Service Datatype Description Local description Type: string id Type: integer locationGroupTypeId Type: integer name Type: string securityLevelId Type: integer Relational datacenters The datacenters in a group. Type: SoftLayer_Location[] locationGroupType The type for this location group. Type: SoftLayer_Location_Group_Type

Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Network_Operations_Center Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Network_Operations_Center extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include network operation center-specific properties. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Office
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Office Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Office extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include office-specific properties. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Rack
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Rack Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Rack extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include rack-specific properties. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Region
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Region Datatype Description A region is made up of a keyname and a description of that region. A region keyname can be used as part of an order. Check the SoftLayer_Product_Order service for more details. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Product_Order::verifyOrder SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder Local description A short description of a region's name. This description is seen on the order forms. Type: string keyname A unique key name for a region.

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Region_Location
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Region_Location Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Location_Region_Location is very specific to the location where services will actually be provisioned. When accessed through a package, this location is the top priority location for a region. All new servers and services are provisioned at this location. When a server is ordered and a region is selected, this is the location within that region where the server will actually exist and have software/services installed.

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Reservation
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Reservation Service Datatype Description Local allotmentId Type: integer id Type: integer locationId Type: integer name Type: string notes Type: string Relational account The account that a billing item belongs to. Type: SoftLayer_Account allotment The bandwidth allotment that the reservation belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Reservation_Rack
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Reservation_Rack Service Datatype Description Local locationId Type: integer locationReservationId Type: integer networkConnectionCapacity Type: integer networkConnectionReservation Type: integer powerConnectionCapacity Type: integer powerConnectionReservation Type: integer slotCapacity Type: integer slotReservation Type: integer Relational allotment The bandwidth allotment that the reservation belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Root
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Root Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Root extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include root-specific properties. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Server_Room Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Server_Room extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include server room-specific properties. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Slot
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Slot Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Slot extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include slot-specific properties. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Status Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Status models the state of any location. SoftLayer uses the following status codes: *“‘ACTIVE”’: The location is currently active and available for public usage. *“‘PLANNED”’: Used when a location is planned but not yet active. *“‘RETIRED”’: Used when a location has been retired and no longer active. Locations in use should stay in the ACTIVE state. If a locations status ever reads anything else and contains active hardware then please contact SoftLayer support.

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Storage_Room
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Storage_Room Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Storage_Room extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include storage room-specific properties. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object Service Datatype Description Metric tracking objects provides a common interface to all metrics provided by SoftLayer. These metrics range from network component traffic for a server to aggregated Bandwidth Pooling traffic and more. Every object within SoftLayer’s range of objects that has data that can be tracked over time has an associated tracking object. Use the [[SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object]] service to retrieve raw and graph data from a tracking object.

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Abstract
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Abstract Datatype Description SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Abstract models a generic tracking object type. Typically a tracking object with a specific purpose has it’s own data type defined within the SoftLayer API. seeAlso SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object Local data The data recorded by a tracking object. Type: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data[] id A tracking object's internal identifier. Type: integer label Tracking object label Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Bandwidth_Summary
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Bandwidth_Summary Service Datatype Description This data type provides commonly used bandwidth summary components for the current billing cycle. Local allocationAmount This is the amount of bandwidth (measured in gigabytes) allocated for this tracking object. Type: float allocationId Type: integer amountOut The amount of outbound bandwidth (measured in gigabytes) currently used this billing period. Same as $outboundBandwidthAmount.

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data Datatype Description SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data models an individual unit of data tracked by a SoftLayer tracking object, including the type of data polled, the date it was polled at, and the counter value that was measured at polling time. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object::getBandwidthData seeAlso SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object Local counter The value stored for a data record. Type: float dateTime The time a data record was stored.

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data_Network_ContentDelivery_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data_Network_ContentDelivery_Account Datatype Description SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data_Network_ContentDelivery_Account models usage data polled from the CDN system. seeAlso SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data Local counter The value stored for a data record. Type: float dateTime The time a data record was stored. Type: dateTime fileName The name of a file. This value is only populated in file-based bandwidth reports. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_HardwareServer
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_HardwareServer Datatype Description SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_HardwareServer models tracking objects specific to physical hardware and the data that are recorded by those servers. seeAlso SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object SoftLayer_Hardware_Server Local data The data recorded by a tracking object. Type: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data[] id A tracking object's internal identifier. Type: integer label Tracking object label Type: string resourceTableId The identifier of the existing resource this object is attempting to track.

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Type Datatype Description SoftLayer [[SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object|tracking objects]] can model various kinds of measured data, from server and virtual server bandwidth usage to CPU use to remote storage usage. SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Type models one of these types and is referred to in tracking objects to reflect what type of data they track. seeAlso SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object Local keyname Description A tracking object type's key name. This is a shorter description of what kind of data a tracking object group is polling.

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_VirtualDedicatedRack
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_VirtualDedicatedRack Datatype Description SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_VirtualDedicatedRack models tracking objects specific to virtual dedicated racks. Bandwidth Pooling aggregate the bandwidth used by multiple servers within the rack. seeAlso SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object Local data The data recorded by a tracking object. Type: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data[] id A tracking object's internal identifier. Type: integer label Tracking object label Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Virtual_Storage_Repository
item.description: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Virtual_Storage_Repository Datatype Description Local data The data recorded by a tracking object. Type: SoftLayer_Metric_Tracking_Object_Data[] id A tracking object's internal identifier. Type: integer label Tracking object label Type: string resourceTableId The identifier of the existing resource this object is attempting to track. Type: integer startDate The date this tracker began tracking this particular resource.

item.title: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent
item.description: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent Service Datatype Description A monitoring agent object contains information describing the agent. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent::getObject Local configurationTemplateId Internal identifier of a configuration template that is used to configure this agent Type: integer createDate Created date Type: dateTime id Internal identifier of a monitoring agent Type: integer modifyDate Last modified date Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Template_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Template_Group Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Template_Group class is consisted of configuration templates for agents in a monitoring package. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Template_Group::getObject Local accountId Internal identifier of a SoftLayer account that this configuration template belongs to Type: integer createDate Created date Type: dateTime description Description of a monitoring agent configuration group Type: string id Internal identifier of a monitoring agent configuration group Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Template_Group_Reference
item.description: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Template_Group_Reference Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Template_Group_Reference class holds the reference information, essentially a SQL join, between a monitoring configuration group and agent configuration templates. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Template_Group::getObject Local configurationTemplateId Internal identifier of a configuration template Type: integer id Internal identifier of a configuration group reference record Type: integer templateGroupId Internal identifier of a monitoring agent configuration group Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Value
item.description: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Configuration_Value Service Datatype Description Monitoring agent configuration value Local agentId Internal identifier of a monitoring Agent that this configuration value Type: integer configurationDefinitionId Internal identifier of a monitoring configuration definition by which Type: integer description User-friendly description of a configuration value. Type: string id Internal identifier of a monitoring configuration value. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent_Status Service Datatype Description Monitoring agent status Local description Description of a monitoring agent status Type: string id Internal identifier of a monitoring agent status Type: integer name Monitoring agent status name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Robot
item.description: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Robot Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Monitoring_Robot data type contains general information relating to a monitoring robot. Local accountId Internal identifier of a SoftLayer account that this robot belongs to Type: integer id Internal identifier of a monitoring robot Type: integer name Robot name Type: string statusId Internal identifier of a monitoring robot status Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Robot_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Monitoring_Robot_Status Datatype Description Your monitoring robot will be in “Active” status under normal circumstances. If you perform an OS reload, your robot will be in “Reclaim” status until it’s reloaded on your server or virtual server. Advanced monitoring system requires “Nimsoft Monitoring (Advanced)” service running and TCP ports 48000 - 48020 to be open on your server or virtual server. Monitoring agents cannot be managed nor can the usage data be updated if these ports are closed.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network
item.description: SoftLayer_Network Service Datatype Description Local accountId The owning account identifier. Type: integer id Unique identifier for the network. Type: integer Relational cidr The size of the Network specified in CIDR notation. Specified in conjunction with the ``networkIdentifier`` to describe the bounding subnet size for the Network. Required for creation. See [[SoftLayer_Network/createObject]] documentation for creation details.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller data type models a single instance of an application delivery controller. Local properties are read only, except for a “notes” property, which can be used to describe your application delivery controller service. The type’s relational properties provide more information to the service’s function and login information to the controller’s backend management if advanced view is enabled. Local accountId The unique identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that owns an application delivery controller record Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_Configuration_History
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_Configuration_History Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_Configuration_History data type models a single instance of a configuration history entry for an application delivery controller. The configuration history entries are used to support creating backups of an application delivery controller’s configuration state in order to restore them later if needed. Local createDate The date a configuration history record was created. Type: dateTime id An configuration history record's unique identifier Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Health_Attribute

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service Service Datatype Description Local enabled Type: integer id Type: integer ipAddressId Type: integer name Type: string notes Type: string port Type: integer status Type: string Relational groupReferences Type: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group_CrossReference[] groups Type: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group[]

item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group Service Datatype Description Local id Type: integer name Type: string notes Type: string routingMethodId Type: integer routingTypeId Type: integer timeout The timeout value for connections from remote clients to the load balancer. Timeout values are only valid for HTTP service groups. Type: integer
