Type: string id The unique id of the key contact.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_MassDataMigration_Request_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_MassDataMigration_Request_Status Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_MassDataMigration_Request_Status data type contains general information relating to the statuses to which a Mass Data Migration Request may be set. Local description The description of the request status. Type: string id The unique id of the request status. Type: integer keyName The unique keyname of the request status. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas contains general information regarding a NAS Storage service such as account id, username, password, maximum capacity, Storage’s product type and capacity. Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_OpenStack_Object
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_OpenStack_Object Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_OpenStack_Object data type models OpenStack specific object storage objects. These storages authenticate through Keystone to access Swift. seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Storage Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Partnership
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Partnership Datatype Description A network storage partnership is used to link multiple volumes to each other. These partnerships describe replication hierarchies or link volume snapshots to their associated storage volume. Local createDate The date a partnership was created. Type: dateTime modifyDate The date a partnership was last modified. Type: dateTime partnerVolumeId The child volume id which a partnership is associated with.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Partnership_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Partnership_Type Datatype Description A network storage partnership type is used to define the link between two volumes. Local description A type's description, for example 'ISCSI snapshot partnership'. Type: string keyname A type's key name, for example 'ISCSI_SNAPSHOT'. Type: string name A type's name, for example 'ISCSI Snapshot'. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Property
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Property Datatype Description A property provides additional information about a volume which it is assigned to. This information can range from “Mountable” flags to utilized snapshot space. Local createDate The date a property was created. Type: dateTime modifyDate The date a property was last modified; Type: dateTime value The value of a property. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Property_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Property_Type Datatype Description The storage property types provide standard definitions for properties which can be used with any type for Storage offering. The properties provide additional information about a volume which they are assigned to. Local description A type's description, for example 'Determines whether the volume is currently mountable'. Type: string keyname A type's keyname, for example 'MOUNTABLE'. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Replicant
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Replicant Datatype Description Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created. Type: dateTime guestId The unique identification number of the guest associated with a Storage volume.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule Service Datatype Description Schedules can be created for select Storage services, such as iscsi. These schedules are used to perform various tasks such as scheduling snapshots or synchronizing replicants. Local active A flag which determines if a schedule is active. Type: integer createDate The date a schedule was created. Type: dateTime id A schedule's internal identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property Datatype Description Schedule properties provide attributes such as start date, end date, interval, and other properties to a storage schedule. Local createDate The date a schedule property was created. Type: dateTime id A schedule property's internal identifier. Type: integer modifyDate The date a schedule property was last modified. Type: dateTime typeId An identifier for the type of a property.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property_Type Service Datatype Description A schedule property type is used to allow for a standardized method of defining network storage schedules. Local description A type's description, for example 'Date for the schedule to start.'. Type: string id A schedule property type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyname A schedule property type's key name, for example 'START_DATE'. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Type Datatype Description A schedule type is used to define what a schedule was created to do. When creating a schedule to take snapshots of a volume, the ‘Snapshot’ schedule type would be used. Local id A schedule type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyname A schedule type's key name, for example 'SNAPSHOT'. Type: string name A schedule type's name, for example 'Snapshot'.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Snapshot
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Snapshot Datatype Description Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created. Type: dateTime guestId The unique identification number of the guest associated with a Storage volume.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Type contains a description of the associated SoftLayer_Network_Storage object. Local description Human readable description for the associated SoftLayer_Network_Storage object. Type: string id ID which corresponds with storageTypeId on storage objects. Type: integer keyName Machine readable description code for the associated SoftLayer_Network_Storage object. Type: string Relational volumes The SoftLayer_Network_Storage object that uses this type.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Subnet data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer subnet. Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are assigned to the account only and not to users belonging to the account. External Links Subnetwork at Wikipedia RFC950:Internet Standard Subnetting Procedure at ietf.org Classless Inter-Domain Routing at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::findAllSubnetsAndActiveSwipTransactionStatus SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getObject SoftLayer_Network_Subnet::getSubnetForIpAddress SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Swip_Transaction::getSubnet SoftLayer_Network_Vlan::getSubnets SoftLayer_Network_Vlan::getSecondarySubnets Local broadcastAddress The last IP address in a subnet is the subnet's broadcast address.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer IPv4 address. External Links Ip address at Wikipedia RFC791: Internet Protocol Specification at ietf.org associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::getObject SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::editObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Vlan SoftLayer_Network_Subnet SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Version6 Local id An IP's internal identifier. Type: integer ipAddress An IP address expressed in dotted quad format.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Global
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Global Service Datatype Description Local description A Global IP Address' associated description Type: integer destinationIpAddressId A Global IP Address' associated [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress|ipAddress]] ID Type: integer id A Global IP Address' unique identifier Type: integer ipAddressId A Global IP Address' associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] ID Type: integer typeId A Global IP Address' associated type [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Global_Type|id]] ID Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Version6
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Version6 Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer IPv6 address. External Links IPv6 at Wikipedia RFC2460: Internet Protocol, Version 6 (IPv6) Specification at ietf.org associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::getObject SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::editObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Vlan SoftLayer_Network_Subnet SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress Local id An IP's internal identifier. Type: integer ipAddress An IP address expressed in dotted quad format.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration Service Datatype Description The subnet registration data type contains general information relating to a single subnet registration instance. These registration instances can be updated to reflect changes, and will record the changes in the [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Event|events]]. Local accountId The registration object's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id Type: integer cidr The CIDR prefix for the registered subnet Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Apnic
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Apnic Datatype Description APNIC-specific registration object. For more detail see [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration (type)|SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration]]. Local accountId The registration object's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id Type: integer cidr The CIDR prefix for the registered subnet Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Unique ID of the registration object Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Arin
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Arin Datatype Description ARIN-specific registration object. For more detail see [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration (type)|SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration]]. Local accountId The registration object's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id Type: integer cidr The CIDR prefix for the registered subnet Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Unique ID of the registration object Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Details
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Details Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Details objects are used to relate [[SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail]] objects to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration]] object. This allows for easy reuse of registration details. It is important to note that only one detail object per type may be associated to a registration object. Local createDate Type: dateTime detailId Numeric ID of the related [[SoftLayer_Account_Regional_Registry_Detail]] object Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Event Datatype Description Each time a [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration|subnet registration]] object is created or modified, the system will generate an event for it. Additional actions that would create an event include RIR responses and error cases. * Local createDate Type: dateTime id Unique numeric ID of the event object Type: integer message A string message indicating what took place during this event Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Event_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Event_Type Datatype Description Subnet Registration Event Type objects describe the nature of a [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Event]] The standard values for these objects are as follows: REGISTRATION_CREATED - Indicates that the registration has been created REGISTRATION_UPDATED - Indicates that the registration has been updated REGISTRATION_CANCELLED - Indicates that the registration has been cancelled RIR_RESPONSE - Indicates that an action taken against the RIR has produced a response. More details will be provided in the event message.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Ripe
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Ripe Datatype Description RIPE-specific registration object. For more detail see [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration (type)|SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration]]. Local accountId The registration object's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id Type: integer cidr The CIDR prefix for the registered subnet Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Unique ID of the registration object Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Registration_Status Service Datatype Description Subnet Registration Status objects describe the current status of a subnet registration. The standard values for these objects are as follows: OPEN - Indicates that the registration object is new and has yet to be submitted to the RIR PENDING - Indicates that the registration object has been submitted to the RIR and is awaiting response COMPLETE - Indicates that the RIR action has completed DELETED - Indicates that the registration object has been gracefully removed is no longer valid CANCELLED - Indicates that the registration object has been abruptly removed is no longer valid

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Rwhois_Data
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Rwhois_Data Service Datatype Description Every SoftLayer customer account has contact information associated with it for reverse WHOIS purposes. An account’s RWHOIS data, modeled by the SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Rwhois_Data data type, is used by SoftLayer’s reverse WHOIS server as well as for SWIP transactions. SoftLayer’s reverse WHOIS servers respond to WHOIS queries for IP addresses belonging to a customer’s servers, returning this RWHOIS data. A SoftLayer customer’s RWHOIS data may not necessarily match their account or portal users’ contact information.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Swip_Transaction
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Swip_Transaction Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_Swip_Transaction data type contains basic information tracked at SoftLayer to allow automation of Swip creation, update, and removal requests. A specific transaction is attached to an accountId and a subnetId. This also contains a “Status Name” which tells the customer what the transaction is doing: REQUEST QUEUED: Request is queued up to be sent to ARIN REQUEST SENT: The email request has been sent to ARIN REQUEST CONFIRMED: ARIN has confirmed that the request is good, and should be available in 24 hours OK: The subnet has been checked with WHOIS and it the SWIP transaction has completed correctly REMOVE QUEUED: A subnet is queued to be removed from ARIN’s systems REMOVE SENT: The removal email request has been sent to ARIN REMOVE CONFIRMED: ARIN has confirmed that the removal request is good, and the subnet should be clear in WHOIS in 24 hours DELETED: This specific SWIP Transaction has been removed from ARIN and is no longer in effect SOFTLAYER MANUALLY PROCESSING: Sometimes a request doesn’t go through correctly and has to be manually processed by SoftLayer.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Tunnel_Module_Context
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Tunnel_Module_Context Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Tunnel_Module_Context data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer network tunnel. The SoftLayer_Network_Tunnel_Module_Context is useful to gather information such as related customer subnets (remote) and internal subnets (local) associated with the network tunnel as well as other information needed to manage the network tunnel. Account and billing information related to the network tunnel can also be retrieved. External Links IPSec at Wikipedia Local accountId A network tunnel's account identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Tunnel_Module_Context_Address_Translation
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Tunnel_Module_Context_Address_Translation Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Tunnel_Module_Context_Address_Translation data type contains general information relating to a single address translation. Information such as notes, ip addresses, along with record information, and network tunnel data may be retrieved. Local customerIpAddress The ip address record that will receive the encrypted traffic. Type: string customerIpAddressId The unique identifier for the ip address record that will receive the encrypted traffic.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Vlan data type models a single VLAN within SoftLayer’s public and private networks. a Virtual LAN is a structure that associates network interfaces on routers, switches, and servers in different locations to act as if they were on the same local network broadcast domain. VLANs are a central part of the SoftLayer network. They can determine how new IP subnets are routed and how individual servers communicate to each other.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan_Firewall
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan_Firewall Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Vlan_Firewall data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer VLAN firewall. This is the object which ties the running rules to a specific downstream server. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Firewall_Template

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan_Firewall_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan_Firewall_Rule Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall_Rule object type represents a currently running firewall rule and contains relative information. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. External Links Firewall at Wikipedia Local action The action that the rule is to take [permit or deny].

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Vlan_Type Service Datatype Description Local description Type: string id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification Service Datatype Description Details provided for the notification are basic. Details such as the related preferences, name and keyname for the notification can be retrieved. The keyname property for the notification can be used to refer to a notification when integrating into the SoftLayer Notification system. The name property can used more for display purposes. Local id Unique identifier for the notification. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Delivery_Method
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Delivery_Method Datatype Description Provides details for the delivery methods available. Local active Determines if the delivery method is still used by the system. Type: integer description Description used for the delivery method. Type: string id Unique identifier for the various notification delivery methods. Type: integer keyName Name that can be used by external systems to refer to delivery method.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile Service Datatype Description This is an extension of the SoftLayer_Notification class. These are implementation details specific to those notifications which can be subscribed to and received on a mobile device. Local id Unique identifier for the notification. Type: integer keyName Name that can be used by external systems to refer to a notification. Type: string name Friendly name for the notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Account Datatype Description Local active Type: integer Relational account Type: SoftLayer_Account lastNotificationUpdate Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Update notificationOccurrenceEvent Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event Service Datatype Description Local endDate When this event will end. Type: dateTime id Unique identifier for this event. Type: integer lastImpactedUserCount Latest count of users impacted by this event. Type: integer modifyDate When this event was last updated. Type: dateTime recoveryTime Type: integer startDate When this event started.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Attachment
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Attachment Datatype Description SoftLayer events can have have files attached to them by a SoftLayer employee. Attaching a file to a event is a way to provide supplementary information such as a RFO (reason for outage) document or root cause analysis. The SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Attachment data type models a single file attached to a event. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event::getAttachedFile seeAlso SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event Local createDate The date the file was attached to the event.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Type Datatype Description This represents the type of SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event. Local keyName The friendly unique identifier for this event type. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource Datatype Description This type contains general information relating to any hardware or services that may be impacted by a SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer resourceAccountId Type: integer resourceName Type: string resourceTableId Type: integer Relational notificationOccurrenceEvent The associated event.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Hardware
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Hardware Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Hardware]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string publicIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string publicIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_VirtualIpAddress]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer publicIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer resourceName Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_EqualLogic]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer resourceName Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Storage_Iscsi_NetApp Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi_NetApp]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer resourceName Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Storage_Lockbox Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Lockbox]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer resourceName Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Storage_Nas Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Storage_NetApp_Volume Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Storage_NetApp_Volume]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Storage_NetApp_Volume_Replicant_Iscsi Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Storage_NetApp_Volume_Replicant_Iscsi]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer resourceName Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Network_Storage_NetApp_Volume_Replicant_Nas Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Network_Storage_NetApp_Volume_Replicant_Nas]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer resourceName Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Virtual Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string publicIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Status_Code Datatype Description Local description Type: string keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User Service Datatype Description This type contains general information relating to a user that may be impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local acknowledgedFlag Type: integer active Type: integer id Type: integer usrRecordId Type: integer Relational impactedResources A collection of resources impacted by the associated event. Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Preference Datatype Description Retrieve details for preferences. Preferences are used to allow the subscriber to modify their subscription in various ways. Details such as friendly name, keyname maximum and minimum values can be retrieved. These provide details to help configure subscriber preferences correctly. Local description A description of what the preference is used for. Type: string id Unique identifier for the notification preference.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber Datatype Description Local active Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime notificationId Type: integer notificationSubscriberTypeId Type: integer notificationSubscriberTypeResourceId Type: integer Relational deliveryMethods Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Delivery_Method[] notification Type: SoftLayer_Notification

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Customer
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Customer Datatype Description Local active Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime notificationId Type: integer notificationSubscriberTypeId Type: integer notificationSubscriberTypeResourceId Type: integer Relational deliveryMethods Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Delivery_Method[] notification Type: SoftLayer_Notification

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Delivery_Method
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Delivery_Method Datatype Description Provides details for the subscriber’s delivery methods. Local active Indicates the subscriber's delivery method availability for notifications. Type: integer createDate Date the subscriber's delivery method was created. Type: dateTime modifyDate Date the subscriber's delivery method was last modified. Type: dateTime notificationDeliveryMethodId Identifier for the notification delivery method. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber Service Datatype Description A notification subscriber will have details pertaining to the subscriber’s notification subscription. You can receive details such as preferences, details of the preferences, delivery methods and the delivery methods for the subscriber. NOTE: There are preferences and delivery methods that cannot be modified. Also, there are some subscriptions that are required. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification::getObject Local active The current status of the subscription.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Billing
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Billing Service Datatype Description A notification subscriber will have details pertaining to the subscriber’s notification subscription. You can receive details such as preferences, details of the preferences, delivery methods and the delivery methods for the subscriber. NOTE: There are preferences and delivery methods that cannot be modified. Also, there are some subscriptions that are required. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification::getObject Local active The current status of the subscription.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Delivery_Method
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Delivery_Method Datatype Description Provides mapping details of how the subscriber’s notification will be delivered. This maps the subscriber’s id with all the delivery method ids used to delivery the notification. Local active Determines if the delivery method is active for the user. Type: integer notificationMethodId Unique identifier of the method used to deliver notification. Type: integer notificationUserSubscriberId Unique identifier of the subscriber tied to the delivery method.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile Service Datatype Description A notification subscriber will have details pertaining to the subscriber’s notification subscription. You can receive details such as preferences, details of the preferences, delivery methods and the delivery methods for the subscriber. NOTE: There are preferences and delivery methods that cannot be modified. Also, there are some subscriptions that are required. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification::getObject Local active The current status of the subscription.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference Service Datatype Description Preferences are settings that can be modified to change the behavior of the subscription. For example, modify the limit preference to only receive notifications 10 times instead of 1 during a billing cycle. NOTE: Some preferences have certain restrictions on values that can be set. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber::editObject Local id Unique identifier for the subscriber's preferences. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource Datatype Description Retrieve identifier cross-reference information. SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource provides the resource table id and subscriber id relation. The resource table id is the id of the service the subscriber receives alerts for. This resource table id could be the unique identifier for a Storage Evault service, Global Load Balancer or CDN service. Local notificationUserSubscriberId Unique identifier of the subscriber that will receive the alerts for the resource subscribed to a notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Catalog
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Catalog Datatype Description A Catalog is defined as a set of prices for products that SoftLayer offers for sale. These prices are organized into packages which represent the different servers and services that SoftLayer offers. Local Relational brands Brands using this Catalog Type: SoftLayer_Brand[] packages Packages available in this catalog Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package[] prices Prices available in this catalog Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Catalog_Item_Price
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Catalog_Item_Price Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Catalog_Item_Price type assigns an Item Price to a Catalog. This relation defines the composition of Item Prices in a Catalog. Local catalogId The id of the Catalog the Item Price is part of. Type: integer createDate The time the Item Price was defined in the Catalog Type: dateTime modifyDate The time the Item Price was changed for the Catalog Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Group Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Group data type contains product group relationship. Local name The name of the product group. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer product. Local capacity Some Product Items have capacity information such as RAM and bandwidth, and others. This provides the numerical representation of the capacity given in the description of this product item. Type: decimal description A product's description Type: string id A product's internal identification number Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Attribute Datatype Description The [[SoftLayer_Product_Item_Attribute]] data type allows us to describe a [[SoftLayer_Product_Item]] by attaching specific attributes, which may dictate how it interacts with other products and services. Most, if not all, of these attributes are geared towards internal usage, so customers should rarely be concerned with them. Local id This is the primary key value for the product attribute. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Attribute_Type Datatype Description The [[SoftLayer_Product_Item_Attribute_Type]] data type defines the available type of product attributes that are available. This allows for convenient reference to a [[SoftLayer_Product_Item_Attribute|product attribute]] by a unique key name value. Local keyName This is the unique identifier of the attribute type. Type: string name This is the user-friendly readable name of the attribute type. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Billing_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Billing_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Billing_Type data type models special billing types for non-monthly billed items in the SoftLayer product catalog. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Item Local name A keyword describing a SoftLayer product item billing type. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Bundles
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Bundles Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Bundles contains item to price cross references Relates a category, price and item to a bundle. Match bundle ids to see all items and prices in a particular bundle. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Item SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category Local bundleItemId Identifier for bundle. Type: integer id Identifier for record. Type: integer itemPriceId Identifier for price.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category data type contains general category information for prices. Local categoryCode The code used to identify this category. Type: string id identifier for category. Type: integer name The friendly, descriptive name of the category as seen on the order forms and on invoices. Type: string quantityLimit Quantity that can be ordered.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Group Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Group data type contains general category group information. Local id identifier for category group. Type: integer name The friendly, descriptive name of the category group as seen on the order forms and on invoices. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Order_Option_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Order_Option_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Order_Option_Type data type contains options that can be applied to orders for prices. Local description An item category order type's description. Type: string id An item category order type's unique identifier. Type: integer keyname A simple description for an item category order type. Type: string name An item category order type's name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question data type represents a single question to be answered by an end user. The question may or may not be required which can be located by looking at the ‘required’ property on the item category references. The answerValueExpression property is a regular expression that is used to validate the answer to the question. The description and valueExample properties can be used to get an idea of the type of answer that should be provided.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question_Field_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question_Field_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question_Field_Type data type represents the recommended type of field that should be rendered on an HTML form. Local id Identifier for the question type. Type: integer keyName Keyname for the question field type. Type: string name Short name for the question field type. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question_Xref
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question_Xref Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category_Question_Xref data type represents a link between an item category and an item category question. It also contains a ‘required’ field that designates if the question is required to be answered for the given item category. Local id Identifier for category question xref record. Type: integer itemCategoryId Identifier for item category. Type: integer locationId Identifier for the question.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Link_ThePlanet
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Link_ThePlanet Datatype Description Local Relational item Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item serviceProvider Type: SoftLayer_Service_Provider Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Overage_Price
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Overage_Price Datatype Description Local Relational defaultOverageItem Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item item Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Policy_Assignment
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Policy_Assignment Service Datatype Description Represents the assignment of a policy to a product. The existence of a record means that the associated product is subject to the terms defined in the document content of the policy. Local id Type: integer productId Type: integer Relational policyName The name of the assigned policy. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer product item price. You can find out what packages each price is in as well as which category under which this price is sold. All prices are returned in floating point values measured in US Dollars ($USD). seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Item (type) SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category Local currentPriceFlag This flag is used by the [[SoftLayer_Hardware::getUpgradeItems|getUpgradeItems]] method to indicate if a product price is used for the current billing item.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Account_Restriction
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Account_Restriction Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price data type gives more information about the item price restrictions. An item price may be restricted to one or more accounts. If the item price is restricted to an account, only that account will see the restriction details. Local accountId The account id for the item price account restriction. Type: integer id The unique identifier for the item price account restriction.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Attribute Datatype Description Local id Type: integer itemPriceAttributeTypeId Type: integer itemPriceId Type: integer value Type: string Relational itemPrice Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price itemPriceAttributeType Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Attribute_Type Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Attribute_Type Datatype Description Local id Type: integer keyname Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Premium
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price_Premium Service Datatype Description Local hourlyModifier Type: decimal itemPriceId Type: integer locationId Type: integer monthlyModifier Type: decimal packageId Type: integer Relational itemPrice Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price location Type: SoftLayer_Location package Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Requirement
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Requirement Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Requirement data type contains information relating to what requirements, if any, exist for an item. The requiredItemId local property is the item id that is required. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Conflict Local id Identifier for this record. Type: integer itemId This is the id of the item affected by the requirement. Type: integer message This is a custom message to display to the user when this requirement shortfall arises.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Resource_Conflict
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Resource_Conflict Datatype Description Local itemId The unique identifier of the item that contains the conflict. Type: integer message An optional conflict message. Type: string packageId The unique identifier of the service offering that is associated with the conflict. Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the conflicting type. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Resource_Conflict_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Resource_Conflict_Item Datatype Description Local itemId The unique identifier of the item that contains the conflict. Type: integer message An optional conflict message. Type: string packageId The unique identifier of the service offering that is associated with the conflict. Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the conflicting type. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Resource_Conflict_Item_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Resource_Conflict_Item_Category Datatype Description Local itemId The unique identifier of the item that contains the conflict. Type: integer message An optional conflict message. Type: string packageId The unique identifier of the service offering that is associated with the conflict. Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the conflicting type. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Resource_Conflict_Location
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Resource_Conflict_Location Datatype Description Local itemId The unique identifier of the item that contains the conflict. Type: integer message An optional conflict message. Type: string packageId The unique identifier of the service offering that is associated with the conflict. Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the conflicting type. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule Datatype Description The item rule data type represents a rule that must be followed when the item assigned to the rule is ordered. The type and operation applied to the resources of the rule will affect how the rule is checked during ordering. Local itemId The unique identifier of the item that the rule applies to. Type: integer message An optional message shown for when the rule is found to be invalid when ordering.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource Datatype Description The item rule resource data type represents a resource that is part of an item rule. The item rule resource is used when its item rule is checked on an order. Local id Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the resource. Type: integer ruleId The unique identifier of the rule this resource is included in.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource_Item Datatype Description Local id Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the resource. Type: integer ruleId The unique identifier of the rule this resource is included in. Type: integer Relational resource A product item that the associated rule applies to. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item rule Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource_Item_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource_Item_Category Datatype Description Local id Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the resource. Type: integer ruleId The unique identifier of the rule this resource is included in. Type: integer Relational resource An item category that the associated rule applies to. Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category rule Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource_Location
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource_Location Datatype Description Local id Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the resource. Type: integer ruleId The unique identifier of the rule this resource is included in. Type: integer Relational resource A location that the associated rule applies to. Type: SoftLayer_Location rule Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource_Permission
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Resource_Permission Datatype Description Local id Type: integer resourceTableId The unique identifier of the resource. Type: integer ruleId The unique identifier of the rule this resource is included in. Type: integer Relational resource A user permission that the associated rule applies to. Type: SoftLayer_User_Customer_CustomerPermission_Permission rule Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Rule_Type Datatype Description The item rule type data type represents the type of an item rule. Local keyName The identifier for the item rule type. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Server_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Server_Group Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Server_Group data type details the type of compute service a [[SoftLayer_Product_Item (type)|SoftLayer_Product_Item]] or [[SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset (type)|SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset]] belongs to. Local keyName The server group's string identifier Type: string name The server group's friendly name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Tax_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Tax_Category Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Tax_Category data type contains the tax categories that are associated with products. Local id An internal identifier for each tax category. Type: integer keyName The key name of the tax category. Type: string name The name of the tax category. Type: string statusFlag The status of the tax category.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Package data type contains information about packages from which orders can be generated. Packages contain general information regarding what is in them, where they are currently sold, availability, and pricing. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Product_Package_Items::getObject SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices::getObject Local description A generic description of the processor type and count. This includes HTML, so you may want to strip these tags if you plan to use it.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Attribute Datatype Description Local value Type: string Relational attributeType Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Attribute_Type package Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Attribute_Type Datatype Description Local description Type: string keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Inventory
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Inventory Datatype Description This is deprecated. Local availableInventoryCount DEPRECATED. The number of units available for purchase in inventory for a single item in a single datacenter. Type: integer itemId DEPRECATED. The unique identifier of the product item that an inventory record is associated with. Type: integer locationId DEPRECATED. The unique identifier of the datacenter that an inventory record is located in.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Category_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Category_Group Datatype Description This class is used to organize categories for a service offering. A service offering (usually) contains multiple categories (e.g., server, os, disk0, ram). This class allows us to organize the prices into related item category groups. Local itemCategoryId The item category id associated with this group. Type: integer packageId The service offering id associated with this group.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Prices contains price to package cross references Relates a category, price and item to a bundle. Match bundle ids to see all items and prices in a particular bundle. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Item SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category Local id The unique identifier for SoftLayer_Product_Package_Item_Price. This is only needed as a reference. The important data is the itemPriceId property. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Items
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Items Datatype Description This data type is a cross-reference between the SoftLayer_Product_Package and the SoftLayer_Product_Item(s) that belong in the SoftLayer_Product_Package. Local id The unique identifier for this object. It is not used anywhere but in this object. Type: string itemId The SoftLayer_Product_Item id to which this instance of the object belongs. Type: integer packageId The SoftLayer_Product_Package id to which this instance of the object belongs.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Locations
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Locations Datatype Description Most packages are available in many locations. This object describes that availability for each package. Local deliveryTimeInformation This describes the availability of the package tied to this location. Type: string isAvailable A simple flag which describes whether or not this location is available for this package. Type: integer locationId The location id tied to this object.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Configuration Datatype Description This datatype describes the item categories that are required for each package to be ordered. For instance, for package 2, there will be many required categories. When submitting an order for a server, there must be at most 1 price for each category whose “isRequired” is set. Examples of required categories: - server - ram - bandwidth - disk0 There are others, but these are the main ones.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Step
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Step Datatype Description Each package has at least 1 step to the ordering process. For server orders, there are many. Each step has certain item categories which are displayed. This type describes the steps for each package. Local id The unique identifier for this object. It is not used anywhere but in this object. Type: integer step The number of the step in the order process for this package.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Step_Next
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Step_Next Datatype Description This datatype simply describes which steps are next in line for ordering. Local id The unique identifier for this object. Type: integer nextOrderStepId The unique identifier for SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Step for the next step in the process. Type: integer orderStepId The unique identifier for SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Step for the current step. Type: integer Relational step The SoftLayer_Product_Package_Order_Step to which this object belongs.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset Service Datatype Description Package presets are used to simplify ordering by eliminating the need for price ids when submitting orders. Orders submitted with a preset id defined will use the prices included in the package preset. Prices submitted on an order with a preset id will replace the prices included in the package preset for that prices category. If the package preset has a fixed configuration flag (fixedConfigurationFlag) set then the prices included in the preset configuration cannot be replaced by prices submitted on the order.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Attribute Datatype Description Package preset attributes contain supplementary information for a package preset. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Attribute_Type Local attributeTypeId The internal identifier of the type of attribute that a pacakge preset attribute belongs to. Type: integer id A package preset attribute's internal identifier. Type: integer presetId The internal identifier of the package preset an attribute belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Attribute_Type Datatype Description SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Attribute_Type models the type of attribute that can be assigned to a package preset. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Attribute Local description A brief description of a package preset attribute type. Type: string id A package preset attribute type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyName A package preset attribute type's key name. This is typically a shorter version of an attribute type's name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset_Configuration Datatype Description Local Relational category Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category packagePreset Type: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Preset price Type: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Server
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Server Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Package_Server data type contains summarized information for bare metal servers regarding pricing, processor stats, and feature sets. Local catalogId The unique identifier of a [[SoftLayer_Product_Catalog]]. Type: integer datacenters Comma-separated list of datacenter names this server is available in Type: string defaultRamCapacity The minimum amount of RAM the server is configured with.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Server_Option
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Server_Option Service Datatype Description The [[SoftLayer_Product_Package_Server_Option]] data type contains various data points associated with package servers that can be used in selection criteria. Local catalogId The unique identifier of a Catalog. Type: integer description A description of the option. Type: string id The unique identifier of a Package Server Option. Type: integer type The type of option.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Package_Type Service Datatype Description The [[SoftLayer_Product_Package_Type]] object indicates the type for a service offering (package). The type can be used to filter packages. For example, if you are looking for the package representing virtual servers, you can filter on the type’s key name of “‘VIRTUAL_SERVER_INSTANCE”‘. For bare metal servers by core or CPU, filter on “‘BARE_METAL_CORE”’ or “‘BARE_METAL_CPU”‘, respectively. Local id The package type's unique identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Upgrade_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Upgrade_Request Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Upgrade_Request data type contains general information relating to a hardware, virtual server, or service upgrade. It also relates a [[SoftLayer_Billing_Order]] to a [[SoftLayer_Ticket]]. seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Order SoftLayer_Ticket Local accountId The unique internal id of a SoftLayer account Type: integer createDate The date an upgrade request was created. Type: dateTime employeeId The unique internal id of the last modified user Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Upgrade_Request_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Upgrade_Request_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Upgrade_Request_Status data type contains detailed information relating to an hardware or software upgrade request. Local description The detailed description of an upgrade request status. Type: string id An internal identifier of an upgrade request status. Type: integer name The name of an upgrade request status. Type: string statusCode The status code of an upgrade request status.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook contains all the information needed to add a hook into a server/Virtual provision and os reload. Local accountId The ID of the account the script belongs to. Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime name The name of the hook.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook_Type Service Datatype Description Local description Type: string id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification represent a maintenance type for the specific hardware maintenance desired. Local id The id of the maintenance classification. Type: integer slots The number of slots required for the maintenance classification. Type: integer type The type or name of the maintenance classification. Type: string Relational itemCategories Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category Service Datatype Description Local itemCategoryId Type: integer maintenanceClassificationId Type: integer Relational maintenanceClassification Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots represent the available slots for a given maintenance window at a SoftLayer data center. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Order_Upgrade_Request Local availableSlots The available slots for a maintenance window. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Ticket
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Ticket Service Datatype Description Local maintClassId Type: integer maintWindowId Type: integer maintenanceDate Type: dateTime ticketId Type: integer Relational availableSlots Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Slots maintenanceClass Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification ticket Type: SoftLayer_Ticket Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window represent a time window that SoftLayer performs a hardware or software maintenance and upgrades. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window::getMaintenanceWindows seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Order_Upgrade_Request Local beginDate The date and time a maintenance window is scheduled to begin. Type: dateTime dayOfWeek An ISO-8601 numeric representation of the day of the week that a maintenance window is performed.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer hardware transaction. SoftLayer customers are unable to change their hardware transactions. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status Local createDate The date a transaction was created. Type: dateTime elapsedSeconds The amount of seconds that have elapsed since the transaction was last modified.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer hardware transaction group. SoftLayer customers are unable to change their hardware transactions or the hardware transaction group. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Group::getObject Local averageTimeToComplete Average time, in minutes, for this type of transaction to complete. Please note that this is only an estimate. Type: decimal name A transaction group's name.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_History
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_History Datatype Description Local finishDate The finish date of a transaction history record. Type: dateTime guestId The guest ID associated with a transaction history. Type: integer hardwareId The hardware ID associated with a transaction history. Type: integer hostId The host ID associated with a transaction history. Type: integer id The ID associated with a transaction history.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer hardware transaction status. SoftLayer customers are unable to change their hardware transaction status. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_Status::getObject Local averageDuration Hardware transaction status average duration. Type: decimal friendlyName Transaction status friendly name. Type: string name Transaction status name. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_SubnetMigration
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Version1_Transaction_SubnetMigration Datatype Description Local createDate The date a transaction was created. Type: dateTime elapsedSeconds The amount of seconds that have elapsed since the transaction was last modified. Type: integer guestId A transaction's associated guest identification number. Type: integer hardwareId A transaction's associated hardware identification number. Type: integer id A transaction's identifying number.

item.title: SoftLayer_Resource_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Resource_Group Service Datatype Description Local createDate A resource group's creation date. Type: dateTime description A resource group's description. Type: string id A resource group's ID. Type: integer keyName A resource group's keyname. Type: string name A resource group's name. Type: string rootResourceGroupId Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Resource_Group_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Resource_Group_Attribute Datatype Description Local createDate A resource group attribute's creation date. Type: dateTime id A resource group attribute's ID. Type: integer value A resource group attribute's value. Type: string Relational group A resource group attribute's resource group. Type: SoftLayer_Resource_Group type A resource group attribute's type. Type: SoftLayer_Resource_Group_Attribute_Type

item.title: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event Service Datatype Description The presale event data types indicate the information regarding an individual presale event. The “‘locationId”’ will indicate the datacenter associated with the presale event. The “‘itemId”’ will indicate the product item associated with a particular presale event - however these are more rare. The “‘startDate”’ and “‘endDate”’ will provide information regarding when the presale event is available for use. At the end of the presale event, the server or services purchased will be available once approved and provisioned.

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Group Service Datatype Description Local accountId The identifier of the account assigned to this group. Type: integer balancedTerminationFlag If this is true, this group will scale down members in a way to preserve the balance across VLANs. If there is ambiguity about which member to use to maintain balance, the terminationPolicy is used to resolve it. This is false by default and can only be set to true if there are multiple VLANs that are being balanced across.

item.title: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate Service Datatype Description Local certificate The certificate provided publicly to clients requesting identity credentials. This certificate is usually signed by a source trusted by the client or a signature chain can be established between this certificate and the truested certificate. This property may only be modified when no services are associated. See associatedServiceCount. Type: string certificateSigningRequest The signing request used to request a certificate authority generate a signed certificate.

item.title: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Entry
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Entry Datatype Description Local certificateId The ID of the certificate record. Type: integer commonName The common name (usually a domain name) encoded within the certificate. Type: string keySize The size (number of bits) of the public key represented by the certificate. Type: integer organizationName The organizational name encoded in the certificate. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Request
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Request Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Request data type is used to harness your SSL certificate order to a Certificate Authority. This contains data that is required by a Certificate Authority to place an SSL certificate order. Local accountId This is a reference to your SoftLayer account. Type: integer approverEmailAddress The email address of a person who will approve your SSL certificate order.

item.title: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Request_ServerType
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Request_ServerType Service Datatype Description Represents a server type that can be specified when ordering an SSL certificate. Local description The description of the certificate server type. Type: string id The internal identifier of the certificate server type. Type: integer name The name of the certificate server type. Type: string value The value of the certificate server type.

item.title: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Request_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Certificate_Request_Status Service Datatype Description Represents the status of an SSL certificate request. Local description The description of a SSL certificate request status Type: string id The internal identifier of an SSL certificate request status Type: integer name The status name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key Service Datatype Description Local createDate The date a ssh key was added. This property is read only. Changes made will be silently ignored. Type: dateTime fingerprint A short sequence of bytes used to authenticate or lookup a longer ssh key. This will automatically be generated upon adding or modifying the ssh key. This property is read only. Changes made will be silently ignored.

item.title: SoftLayer_Service_External_Resource
item.description: SoftLayer_Service_External_Resource Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Service_External_Resource is a placeholder that references a service being provided outside of the standard SoftLayer system. Local accountId The customer account that is consuming the related service. Type: integer externalIdentifier The unique identifier in the service provider's system. Type: string id An external resource's unique identifier in the SoftLayer system. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Service_Provider

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense is a class that represents software licenses that are tied only to a customer’s account and not to any particular hardware, IP address, etc. seeAlso SoftLayer_Account SoftLayer_Software_Description Local accountId The ID of the SoftLayer Account to which this Account License belongs to. Type: integer capacity Some Account Licenses have capacity information such as CPU specified in the units key.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component Service Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Software_Component ties the installation of a specific piece of software onto a specific piece of hardware. SoftLayer_Software_Component works with SoftLayer_Software_License and SoftLayer_Software_Description to tie this all together. SoftLayer_Software_Component is the installation of a specific piece of software onto a specific piece of hardware in accordance to a software license. SoftLayer_Software_License dictates when and how a specific piece of software may be installed onto a piece of hardware.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Analytics
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Analytics Datatype Description This object specifies a specific type of Software Component: An analytics instance. Analytics installations have a specific default ports and patterns for usernames and passwords. Defaults are initiated by this object. Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Analytics_Urchin
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Analytics_Urchin Datatype Description This object specifies a specific Software Component: An Urchin instance. Urchin installations have a specific default port (9999) and a pattern for usernames and passwords. Defaults are initiated by this object. seeAlso SoftLayer_Software_Component Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpyware
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpyware Service Datatype Description This object specifies a specific type of Software Component: An Anti-virus/spyware instance. Anti-virus/spyware installations have specific properties and methods such as SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpyware::updateAntivirusSpywarePolicy. Defaults are initiated by this object. Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpyware_Mcafee

Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license. Type: string manufacturerLicenseInstance A license key for this specific installation of software, if it is needed.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpyware_Mcafee_Epo_Version36

item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_ControlPanel_WebhostAutomation Datatype Description This object specifies a specific Software Component: A Helm instance produced by Webhost Automation. WEbhost Automation’s Helm installations have a specific default port (8086) and a pattern for usernames and passwords. Defaults are initiated by this object. Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer

Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license.

Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license. Type: string manufacturerLicenseInstance A license key for this specific installation of software, if it is needed.

Type: string hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license.
