item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Password Service Datatype Description This SoftLayer_Software_Component_Password data type contains a password for a specific software component instance. seeAlso SoftLayer_Software_Component SoftLayer_Software_Password_History Local createDate The date this username/password pair was created. Type: dateTime id An id number for this specific username/password pair. Type: integer modifyDate The date of the last modification to this username/password pair.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Password_History
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Password_History Datatype Description This object allows you to find the history of password changes for a specific SoftLayer_Software Component seeAlso SoftLayer_Software_Component SoftLayer_Software_Password Local createDate The date this username/password pair was created. Type: dateTime notes A note string stored for this username/password pair. Type: string password The password part of this specific password history instance.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Security
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Security Datatype Description This object specifies a specific type of Software Component: A security instance. Security installations have custom configurations for password requirements. Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Security_SafeNet
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Security_SafeNet Datatype Description This object specifies a specific Software Component: A SafeNet instance. SafeNet installations have custom configurations for password requirements. seeAlso SoftLayer_Software_Component Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description Service Datatype Description This class holds a description for a specific installation of a Software Component. SoftLayer_Software_Licenses tie a Software Component (A specific installation on a piece of hardware) to it’s description. The “Manufacturer” and “Name” properties of a SoftLayer_Software_Description are used by the framework to factory specific objects, objects that may have special methods for that specific piece of software, or objects that contain application specific data, such as default ports.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Software_Description_Attribute data type represents an attributes associated with this software description. Local value The value that was assigned to this attribute. Type: string Relational softwareDescription Type: SoftLayer_Software_Description type Type: SoftLayer_Software_Description_Attribute_Type Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description_Attribute_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Software_Description_Attribute_Type data type represents the type of an attribute. Local keyname The keyname for this attribute type. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description_Feature
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description_Feature Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Software_Description_Feature data type represents a single software description feature. A feature may show up on more than one software description and can not be created, modified, or removed. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Software_Description::getFeatures Local id The unique identifier for a software description feature. Type: integer keyName A unique name used to reference this software description feature. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description_RequiredUser
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description_RequiredUser Datatype Description This class represents a software description’s required user Local defaultPassword If the default password is set the user will be created with that password, otherwise a random password is generated. Type: string username If this software has a required user (such as "root") this string contains it's name. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_License
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_License Datatype Description This class describes a specific type of license, like a Microsoft Windows Site License, a GPL license, or a license of another type. seeAlso SoftLayer_Software_Component SoftLayer_Software_Description Local id An ID number for this specific License type. Type: integer softwareDescriptionId The ID number of a Software Description that this specific license is valid for.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense is the application class that handles a special type of Software License. Most software licenses are licensed to a specific hardware ID; virtual licenses are designed for virtual machines and therefore are assigned to an IP Address. Not all software packages can be “virtual licensed”. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense::getObject SoftLayer_Account::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Software_Description SoftLayer_Network_Subnet SoftLayer_Account Local accountId The ID of the SoftLayer Account to which this Virtual License belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey. Local active A flag indicating if a survey can be taken. Type: integer createDate The date that a survey had originally started. Type: dateTime id A survey's id. Type: integer name A survey's name or title.

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Answer
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Answer Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Answer data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey answer. Local answer A survey answer's answer that a user can response too. Type: string answerOrder A value indicating the order in when a survey answer will be displayed to a user. Type: integer id A survey answer's Id. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Question
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Question Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Question data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey question. Local id A survey question's Id. Type: integer isRequired A flag indicating that a survey question requires a response. Type: integer multiAnswer A flag indicating that a survey question can have multiple answers responded to. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Response
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Response Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Response data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer survey response. Local otherAnswer The user typed response for the [[SoftLayer_Survey_Answer|Survey Answer]] that a response is associated with. Type: string surveyAnswerId The Id of the [[SoftLayer_Survey_Answer|Survey Answer]] that a response was made for. Type: integer Relational surveyAnswer The survey answer that this response was to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Status data type contains survey status information. Local description Description of a survey status Type: string id Internal identifier of a survey status Type: integer name Name of a survey status Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Survey_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Survey_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Survey_Type data type contains survey type information. Local description Description of a survey type Type: string id Internal identifier of a survey type Type: integer name Name of a survey type Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Tag
item.description: SoftLayer_Tag Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Tag data type is an optional type associated with hardware. The account ID that the tag is tied to, and the tag itself are stored in this data type. There is also a flag to denote whether the tag is internal or not. Local accountId Account the tag belongs to. Type: integer id Unique identifier for a tag.

item.title: SoftLayer_Tag_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Tag_Type Datatype Description Local description Type: string keyName Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Ticket data type models a single SoftLayer customer support or notification ticket. Each ticket object contains references to it’s updates, the user it’s assigned to, the SoftLayer department and employee that it’s assigned to, and any hardware objects or attached files associated with the ticket. Tickets are described in further detail on the [[SoftLayer_Ticket]] service page. To create a support ticket execute the [[SoftLayer_Ticket::createStandardTicket|createStandardTicket]] or [[SoftLayer_Ticket::createAdministrativeTicket|createAdministrativeTicket]] methods in the SoftLayer_Ticket service.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Activity
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Activity Datatype Description Local createDate Type: dateTime createTimestamp Type: dateTime id Type: integer value Type: string Relational editor Type: SoftLayer_User_Interface ticket Type: SoftLayer_Ticket ticketUpdate Type: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment Datatype Description SoftLayer tickets have the ability to be associated with specific pieces of hardware in a customer’s inventory. Attaching hardware to a ticket can greatly increase response time from SoftLayer for issues that are related to one or more specific servers on a customer’s account. The SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Hardware data type models the relationship between a piece of hardware and a ticket. Only one attachment record may exist per hardware item per ticket.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Assigned_Agent
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Assigned_Agent Datatype Description Local assignedAgentId The internal identifier of an assigned Agent that is attached to a ticket. Type: integer attachmentId The internal identifier of an item that is attached to a ticket. Type: integer createDate The date that an item was attached to a ticket. Type: dateTime id A ticket attachment's internal identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_CardChangeRequest
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_CardChangeRequest Datatype Description This datatype contains tickets referenced from card change request Local attachmentId The internal identifier of an item that is attached to a ticket. Type: integer createDate The date that an item was attached to a ticket. Type: dateTime id A ticket attachment's internal identifier. Type: integer ticketId The internal identifier of the ticket that an item is attached to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Dedicated_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Dedicated_Host Datatype Description SoftLayer tickets have the ability to be associated with specific dedicated hosts in a customer’s inventory. Attaching a dedicated host to a ticket can greatly increase response time from SoftLayer for issues that are related to one or more specific hosts on a customer’s account. The SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Dedicated_Host data type models the relationship between a dedicated host and a ticket. Only one attachment record can exist per dedicated host item per ticket.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_File
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_File Service Datatype Description SoftLayer tickets can have have files attached to them. Attaching a file to a ticket is a good way to report issues, provide documentation, and give examples of an issue. Both SoftLayer customers and employees have the ability to attach files to a ticket. The SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_File data type models a single file attached to a ticket. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Ticket::getAttachedFiles SoftLayer_Ticket::getAttachedFile seeAlso SoftLayer_Ticket

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Hardware
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Hardware Datatype Description SoftLayer tickets have the ability to be associated with specific pieces of hardware in a customer’s inventory. Attaching hardware to a ticket can greatly increase response time from SoftLayer for issues that are related to one or more specific servers on a customer’s account. The SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Hardware data type models the relationship between a piece of hardware and a ticket. Only one attachment record may exist per hardware item per ticket.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Manual_Payment
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Manual_Payment Datatype Description This datatype contains tickets referenced from manual payments Local attachmentId The internal identifier of an item that is attached to a ticket. Type: integer createDate The date that an item was attached to a ticket. Type: dateTime id A ticket attachment's internal identifier. Type: integer ticketId The internal identifier of the ticket that an item is attached to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Network_Storage_Mass_Data_Migration
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Network_Storage_Mass_Data_Migration Datatype Description Local attachmentId The internal identifier of an item that is attached to a ticket. Type: integer createDate The date that an item was attached to a ticket. Type: dateTime id A ticket attachment's internal identifier. Type: integer requestId Type: integer ticketId The internal identifier of the ticket that an item is attached to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Scheduled_Action
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Scheduled_Action Datatype Description Local attachmentId The internal identifier of an item that is attached to a ticket. Type: integer createDate The date that an item was attached to a ticket. Type: dateTime id A ticket attachment's internal identifier. Type: integer runDate The internal identifier of a scheduled action transaction that is attached to a ticket.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Virtual_Guest
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Virtual_Guest Datatype Description SoftLayer tickets have the ability to be associated with specific virtual guests in a customer’s inventory. Attaching virtual guests to a ticket can greatly increase response time from SoftLayer for issues that are related to one or more specific servers on a customer’s account. The SoftLayer_Ticket_Attachment_Virtual_Guest data type models the relationship between a virtual guest and a ticket. Only one attachment record may exist per virtual guest per ticket.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat Datatype Description Local customerId Type: integer endDate Type: dateTime startDate Type: dateTime transcript Type: string Relational agent Type: SoftLayer_User_Employee customer Type: SoftLayer_User_Customer ticketUpdate Type: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Chat Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat_Liveperson
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat_Liveperson Datatype Description Local customerId Type: integer endDate Type: dateTime startDate Type: dateTime transcript Type: string Relational agent Type: SoftLayer_User_Employee customer Type: SoftLayer_User_Customer ticketUpdate Type: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Chat Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat_TranscriptLine
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat_TranscriptLine Datatype Description Local Relational speaker Type: SoftLayer_User_Interface Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat_TranscriptLine_Customer
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat_TranscriptLine_Customer Datatype Description Local Relational speaker Type: SoftLayer_User_Customer Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat_TranscriptLine_Employee
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Chat_TranscriptLine_Employee Datatype Description Local Relational speaker Type: SoftLayer_User_Employee Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_EuCompliance
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_EuCompliance Datatype Description Local Relational datacenter Type: SoftLayer_Location ticket Type: SoftLayer_Ticket Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Group Datatype Description SoftLayer tickets have the ability to be assigned to one of SoftLayer’s internal departments. The department that a ticket is assigned to is modeled by the SoftLayer_Ticket_Group data type. Ticket groups help to ensure that the proper department is handling a ticket. Standard support tickets are created from a number of pre-determined subjects. These subjects help determine which group a standard ticket is assigned to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Group_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Group_Category Datatype Description SoftLayer’s support ticket groups represent the department at SoftLayer that is assigned to work one of your support tickets. Many departments are responsible for handling different types of tickets. These types of tickets are modeled in the SoftLayer_Ticket_Group_Category data type. Ticket group categories also help separate differentiate your tickets’ issues in the SoftLayer customer portal. seeAlso SoftLayer_Ticket SoftLayer_Ticket_Group Local id A ticket group category's unique identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Priority
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Priority Service Datatype Description Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_State
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_State Datatype Description Local id Type: integer stateTypeId Type: integer ticketId Type: integer Relational stateType Type: SoftLayer_Ticket_State_Type ticket Type: SoftLayer_Ticket Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_State_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_State_Type Datatype Description Local description Type: string id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Status Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Ticket_Status data type models the state of a ticket as it is worked by SoftLayer and its customers. Tickets exist in one of three states: *“‘OPEN”’: Open tickets are considered unresolved issues by SoftLayer and can be assigned to a SoftLayer employee for work. Tickets created by portal or API users are created in the Open state. *“‘ASSIGNED”’: Assigned tickets are identical to open tickets, but are assigned to an individual SoftLayer employee.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject data type models one of the possible subjects that a standard support ticket may belong to. A basic support ticket’s title matches it’s corresponding subject’s name. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject::getObject SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject::getAllObjects SoftLayer_Ticket::getSubject seeAlso SoftLayer_Ticket (type) SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject Local categoryId The subject category id that this ticket subject belongs to. Type: integer id A ticket subject's internal identifier.

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject_Category
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject_Category Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject_Category groups ticket subjects into logical group. seeAlso SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject Local id A unique identifier of a ticket subject category. Type: integer name A ticket subject category name. Type: string Relational subjects Type: SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject[] Count subjectCount A count of Type: unsignedLong

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Survey
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Survey Service Datatype Description Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Type Datatype Description Local id Type: integer keyName Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Ticket_Update type relates to a single update to a ticket, either by a customer or an employee. Local createDate The data a ticket update was created. Type: dateTime editorId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer portal or API user who created a ticket update. This is only used if a ticket update's ''editorType'' property is "

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Agent
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Agent Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Agent type models an update to a ticket made by an agent. seeAlso SoftLayer_Ticket_Update SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Employee SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Customer Local createDate The data a ticket update was created. Type: dateTime editorId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer portal or API user who created a ticket update. This is only used if a ticket update's ''editorType'' property is "

Type: dateTime editorId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer portal or API user who created a ticket update. This is only used if a ticket update's ''editorType'' property is "

item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Customer Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Customer is a single update made by a customer to a ticket. seeAlso SoftLayer_Ticket_Update SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Employee Local createDate The data a ticket update was created. Type: dateTime editorId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer portal or API user who created a ticket update. This is only used if a ticket update's ''editorType'' property is "

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Employee
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Employee Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Employee data type models an update to a ticket made by a SoftLayer employee. seeAlso SoftLayer_Ticket SoftLayer_Ticket_Update SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Customer Local createDate The data a ticket update was created. Type: dateTime editorId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer portal or API user who created a ticket update. This is only used if a ticket update's ''editorType'' property is "

item.title: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Type Datatype Description Local description Type: string keyName Type: string Relational ticket Type: SoftLayer_Ticket_Update Count

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Log
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Log Datatype Description This class represents a login/logout sheet for facility visitors. Local accountId This is the account associated with a log record. For a customer logging into a datacenter, this is the customer's account. For a contractor or any other guest logging into a customer's cabinet or colocation cage, this is the customer's account. Type: integer description This is a short description of why the person is at the location.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Log_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Log_Type Datatype Description Local id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Visitor
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Visitor Datatype Description This class represents a facility visitor that is not an active employee or customer. Local companyName Type: string firstName Type: string lastName Type: string typeId Type: integer Relational visitorType Type: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Visitor_Type Count

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Visitor_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Access_Facility_Visitor_Type Datatype Description Local id Type: integer keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer customer portal user. Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are not necessarily associated with the customer account the user is assigned to. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer::getObject SoftLayer_Account::getUsers Local accountId A portal user's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|customer account]] id. Type: integer address1 The first line of the mailing address belonging to a portal user.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Access_Authentication
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Access_Authentication Datatype Description SoftLayer_User_Customer_Access_Authentication models a single attempt to log into the SoftLayer customer portal. A SoftLayer_User_Customer_Access_Authentication record is created every time a user attempts to log into the portal. Use this service to audit your users’ portal activity and diagnose potential security breaches of your SoftLayer portal accounts. Unsuccessful login attempts can be caused by an incorrect password, failing to answer or not answering a login security question if the user has them configured, or attempting to log in from an IP address outside of the user’s IP address restriction list.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_AdditionalEmail
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_AdditionalEmail Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_AdditionalEmail data type contains the additional email for use in ticket update notifications. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer_AdditionalEmail::getObject SoftLayer_Ticket::attachedAdditionalEmails SoftLayer_User_Customer::additionalEmails Local email Email assigned to user for use in ticket update notifications. Type: string userId An internal identifier for the portal user who this additional email belongs to. Type: integer Relational user The portal user that owns this additional email address.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_ApiAuthentication
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_ApiAuthentication Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_ApiAuthentication type contains user’s authentication key(s). associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer::getApiAuthenticationKeys SoftLayer_User_Customer_ApiAuthentication::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_User_Customer Local authenticationKey The user's authentication key for API access. Type: string id The user's API authentication identifying number. Type: integer ipAddressRestriction The IP addresses or IP ranges from which this user may access the SoftLayer API.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_CustomerPermission_Permission
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_CustomerPermission_Permission Service Datatype Description Each SoftLayer portal account is assigned a series of permissions that determine what access the user has to functions within the SoftLayer customer portal. This status is reflected in the SoftLayer_User_Customer_Status data type. Permissions differ from user status in that user status applies globally to the portal while user permissions are applied to specific portal functions. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer::getPermissions SoftLayer_User_Customer_CustomerPermission_Permission::getObject seeAlso Permissions

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding data type contains general information for a single external binding. This includes the 3rd party vendor, type of binding, and a unique identifier and password that is used to authenticate against the 3rd party service. Local active The flag that determines whether the external binding is active will be used for authentication or not. Type: boolean

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Attribute data type contains the value for a single attribute associated with an external binding. External binding attributes contain additional information about an external binding. An attribute can be generic or specific to a 3rd party vendor. For example these attributes relate to Verisign: *Credential Type *Credential State *Credential Expiration Date *Credential Last Update Date Local value The value of an external binding attribute.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone data type contains information about an external binding that uses a phone call, SMS or mobile app for 2 form factor authentication. The external binding information is used when a SoftLayer customer logs into the SoftLayer customer portal or VPN to authenticate them against a trusted 3rd party, in this case using a mobile phone, mobile phone application or land-line phone.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Totp
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Totp Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Totp data type contains information about a single time-based one time password external binding. The external binding information is used when a SoftLayer customer logs into the SoftLayer customer portal to authenticate them. The information provided by this external binding data type includes: * The type of credential * The current state of the credential ** Active ** Inactive SoftLayer users with an active external binding will be prohibited from using the API for security reasons.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Type data type contains information relating to a type of external authentication binding. It contains a user friendly name as well as a unique key name. Local keyName The unique name used to identify a type of external authentication binding. Type: string name The user friendly name of a type of external authentication binding. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Vendor
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Vendor Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Vendor data type contains information for a single external binding vendor. This information includes a user friendly vendor name, a unique version of the vendor name, and a unique internal identifier that can be used when creating a new external binding. Local id The unique identifier for an external binding vendor. Type: integer keyName A unique version of the name property.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign data type contains information about a single VeriSign external binding. The external binding information is used when a SoftLayer customer logs into the SoftLayer customer portal to authenticate them against a 3rd party, in this case VeriSign. The information provided by the VeriSign external binding data type includes: * The type of credential * The current state of the credential ** Enabled ** Disabled ** Locked * The credential’s expiration date * The last time the credential was updated

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Invitation
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Invitation Service Datatype Description Local code Type: string createDate Type: dateTime creatorId Type: integer creatorType Type: string email Type: string existingBlueIdFlag Type: integer expirationDate Type: dateTime ibmIdUsername Type: string id Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Link

item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Link_ThePlanet Datatype Description Local createDate Type: dateTime defaultFlag Type: integer destinationUserAlphanumericId Type: string destinationUserId Type: integer ibmIdUniqueIdentifier Type: string id Type: integer serviceProviderId Type: integer userId Type: integer Relational serviceProvider Type: SoftLayer_Service_Provider

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_MobileDevice
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_MobileDevice Service Datatype Description This class represents a mobile device belonging to a user. The device can be a phone, tablet, or possibly even some Android based net books. The purpose is to tie just enough info with the device and the user to enable push notifications through non-softlayer entities (Google, Apple, RIM). Local createDate Created date for the record. Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_MobileDevice_OperatingSystem
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_MobileDevice_OperatingSystem Service Datatype Description This class represents the mobile operating system installed on a user’s registered mobile device. It assists us when determining the how to get a push notification to the user. Local buildVersion Build revision number of the operating system. Type: integer createDate Create date of the record. Type: dateTime description Description of the mobile operating system.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_MobileDevice_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_MobileDevice_Type Service Datatype Description Describes a supported class of mobile device. In this the word class is used in the context of classes of consumer electronic devices, the two most prominent examples being mobile phones and tablets. seeAlso SoftLayer_User_Customer_Mobile_Device Local createDate Record create date. Type: dateTime description A description of the device Type: string id Indentifier for record.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Notification_Hardware
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Notification_Hardware Service Datatype Description The Customer_Notification_Hardware object stores links between customers and the hardware devices they wish to monitor. This link is not enough, the user must be sure to also create SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host instance with the response action set to “notify users” in order for the users linked to that hardware object to be notified on failure. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer_Notification_Hardware::findByHardwareId Local hardwareId The ID of the Hardware object that is to be monitored.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Notification_Virtual_Guest
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Notification_Virtual_Guest Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_Notification_Virtual_Guest object stores links between customers and the virtual guests they wish to monitor. This link is not enough, the user must be sure to also create SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host instance with the response action set to “notify users” in order for the users linked to that hardware object to be notified on failure. Local guestId The ID of the virtual guest object that is to be monitored.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect Service Datatype Description Local accountId A portal user's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|customer account]] id. Type: integer address1 The first line of the mailing address belonging to a portal user. Type: string address2 The second line of the mailing address belonging to a portal user. Type: string aim A portal user's AOL Instant Messenger screen name.

item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Prospect_ServiceProvider_EnrollRequest Service Datatype Description Contains user information for Service Provider Enrollment. Local acceptAllAgreementsFlag Flag indicating whether or not applicant has accepted all current SSP agreements. Type: boolean accountId accountId of existing SoftLayer Customer Type: integer address1 Service provider address1 Type: string address2 Service provider address2 Type: string cardAccountNumber Credit card account number Type: string

item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Prospect_Type Datatype Description Local createDate Type: dateTime description Type: string id Type: integer keyName Type: string modifyDate Type: dateTime name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Security_Answer
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Security_Answer Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_Security_Answer type contains user’s answers to security questions. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer::getSecurityAnswers SoftLayer_User_Customer_Security_Answer::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_User_Customer SoftLayer_User_Security_Question Local answer A user's answer. Type: string id A user's answer identifying number. Type: integer questionId A user's question identifying number. Type: integer userId A user's identifying number.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Status Service Datatype Description Each SoftLayer portal account is assigned a status code that determines how it’s treated in the customer portal. This status is reflected in the SoftLayer_User_Customer_Status data type. Status differs from user permissions in that user status applies globally to the portal while user permissions are applied to specific portal functions. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer::getUserStatus SoftLayer_User_Customer_Status::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_User_Customer Local id A user's status identifying number.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Employee
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Employee Datatype Description A SoftLayer_User_Employee models a single SoftLayer employee for the purposes of ticket updates created by SoftLayer employees. SoftLayer portal and API users cannot see individual employee names in ticket responses. SoftLayer employees can be assigned to customer accounts as a personal support representative. Employee names and email will be available if an employee is assigned to the account. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account::getSupportRepresentatives seeAlso SoftLayer_Ticket_Update_Employee Local displayName Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Employee_Department
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Employee_Department Datatype Description SoftLayer_User_Employee_Department models a department within SoftLayer’s internal employee hierarchy. Common departments include Support, Sales, Accounting, Development, Systems, and Networking. seeAlso SoftLayer_User_Employee Local name The name of one of SoftLayer's employee departments. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding
item.description: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_External_Binding data type contains general information for a single external binding. This includes the 3rd party vendor, type of binding, and a unique identifier and password that is used to authenticate against the 3rd party service. Local active The flag that determines whether the external binding is active will be used for authentication or not. Type: boolean

item.title: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Attribute data type contains the value for a single attribute associated with an external binding. External binding attributes contain additional information about an external binding. An attribute can be generic or specific to a 3rd party vendor. For example these attributes relate to Verisign: *Credential Type *Credential State *Credential Expiration Date *Credential Last Update Date Local value The value of an external binding attribute.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Type Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Type data type contains information relating to a type of external authentication binding. It contains a user friendly name as well as a unique key name. Local keyName The unique name used to identify a type of external authentication binding. Type: string name The user friendly name of a type of external authentication binding. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor
item.description: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor data type contains information for a single external binding vendor. This information includes a user friendly vendor name, a unique version of the vendor name, and a unique internal identifier that can be used when creating a new external binding. Local id The unique identifier for an external binding vendor. Type: integer keyName A unique version of the name property.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Interface
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Interface Datatype Description A SoftLayer_User_Interface represents a generic user instance within the SoftLayer API. The SoftLayer API uses SoftLayer_User_Interfaces in cases where a user object could be one of many types of users. Currently the [[SoftLayer_User_Customer]] and [[SoftLayer_User_Employee]] classes are abstracted by this type. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Ticket_Update::getEditor seeAlso SoftLayer_User_Customer SoftLayer_User_Employee Local

item.description: SoftLayer_User_Permission_Action Service Datatype Description Local createDate Type: dateTime description Type: string id Type: integer key Type: string keyName Type: string modifyDate Type: dateTime name Type: string

Type: integer createDate The date the permission group record was created. Type: dateTime description The description of the permission group. Type: string expirationDate The date the temporary group will be destroyed. Type: dateTime id A permission groups internal identifying number.

Local description A description of the preference type Type: string keyName Type: string name The name of the preference type Type: string valueExample An example of accepted preference values Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Security_Question
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Security_Question Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Security_Question data type contains questions. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Security_Question::getAllObjects() Local displayOrder A security question's display order. Type: integer id A security question's internal identifying number. Type: integer question A security question's question. Type: string viewable A security question's viewable flag. Type: integer

item.description: SoftLayer_Utility_ObjectFilter_Operation Datatype Description Local

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_DedicatedHost
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_DedicatedHost Service Datatype Description This data type presents the structure for a dedicated host. The data type contains relational properties to distinguish a dedicated host and associate an account to it. Local accountId The dedicated host's associated account id. Type: integer cpuCount The capacity that the dedicated host's CPU allocation is restricted to. Type: integer createDate The date that the dedicated host was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image Service Datatype Description The virtual disk image data type presents the structure in which a virtual disk image will be presented. Virtual block devices are assigned to disk images. Local capacity A disk image's size measured in gigabytes. Type: integer checksum A disk image's unique md5 checksum. Type: string createDate The date a disk image was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software record connects a computing instance’s virtual disk images with software records. This can be useful if a disk image is directly associated with software such as operating systems. seeAlso SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image SoftLayer_Software_Description Local id The unique identifier of a virtual disk image to software relationship. Type: integer softwareDescriptionId The unique identifier of the software that a virtual disk image is associated with.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software_Password
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software_Password Datatype Description This SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software_Password data type contains a password for a specific virtual disk image software instance. seeAlso SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software Local password A virtual disk images' password. Type: string username A virtual disk images' username. Type: string Relational software The instance that this username/password pair is valid for. Type: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Type Datatype Description SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Type models the types of virtual disk images available to CloudLayer Computing Instances. Virtual disk image types describe if an image’s data is preservable when upgraded, whether a disk contains a suspended virtual image, or if a disk contains crash dump information. seeAlso SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image Local description A brief description of a virtual disk image type's function. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest Service Datatype Description The virtual guest data type presents the structure in which all virtual guests will be presented. Internally, the structure supports various virtualization platforms with no change to external interaction. A guest, also known as a virtual server, represents an allocation of resources on a virtual host. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::checkHostDiskAvailability Local accountId A computing instance's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Attribute Datatype Description Local value A guest attribute's value. Type: string Relational guest Type: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest type Type: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Attribute_Type Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Attribute_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Attribute_Type Datatype Description Local keyname Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Attribute_UserData
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Attribute_UserData Datatype Description Local value A guest attribute's value. Type: string Relational guest Type: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest type Type: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Attribute_Type Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device Datatype Description The block device data type presents the structure in which all block devices will be presented. A block device attaches a disk image to a guest. Internally, the structure supports various virtualization platforms with no change to external interaction. A guest, also known as a virtual server, represents an allocation of resources on a virtual host. Local bootableFlag A flag indicating if a block device can be booted from.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Status
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Status Datatype Description Local keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template Datatype Description The virtual block device template data type presents the structure in which all archived image templates are presented. A virtual block device template, also known as a image template, represents the image of a virtual guest instance. Local device A name that identifies a block device template. Type: string diskImageId A block device template's [[SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image|disk image]] ID.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Group Service Datatype Description The virtual block device template group data type presents the structure in which a group of archived image templates will be presented. The structure consists of a parent template group which contain multiple child template group objects. Each child template group object represents the image template in a particular location. Unless editing/deleting a specific child template group object, it is best to use the parent object.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Group_Accounts
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Group_Accounts Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Group_Accounts data type represents the SoftLayer customer accounts which have access to provision CloudLayer Computing Instances from an image template group. All accounts other than the image template group owner have read-only access to that image template group. It is important to note that this data type should only exist to give accounts access to the parent template group object, not the child. All image template sharing between accounts should occur on the parent object.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Block_Device_Template_Group_Status

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Boot_Parameter_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Boot_Parameter_Type Service Datatype Description Describes a virtual guest boot parameter. In this the word class is used in the context of arguments sent to cloud computing instances such as single user mode and boot into bash. seeAlso SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Boot_Parameter Local bootOption Available boot options. Type: string createDate Type: dateTime description A description of the boot parameter Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Network_Component
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Network_Component Service Datatype Description The virtual guest network component data type presents the structure in which all computing instance network components are presented. Internally, the structure supports various virtualization platforms with no change to external interaction. A guest, also known as a virtual server, represents an allocation of resources on a virtual host. Local createDate The date a computing instance's network component was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Network_Component_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Network_Component_IpAddress Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Network_Component_IpAddress data type contains general information relating to the binding of a single network component to a single SoftLayer IP address. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::getObject SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress::editObject Local ipAddressId The unique ID of the [[SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_ipAddress|ip address]] this virtual IP address is associated with. Type: integer port The port that a network component has reserved. This field is only required for some IP address types.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Power_State
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Power_State Datatype Description The power state class provides a common set of values for which a guest’s power state will be presented in the SoftLayer API. Local description The description of a power state Type: string keyName The key name of a power state Type: string name The name of a power state Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_SupplementalCreateObjectOptions
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_SupplementalCreateObjectOptions Datatype Description Local bootMode The mode used to boot the [[SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest]]. Supported values are 'PV' and 'HVM'. Type: string flavorKeyName When set the startCpus and maxMemory are defined by the flavor. If the flavor includes local storage blockDevice 0 is also defined by the flavor. When startCpus, maxMemory, or blockDevice 0 are also provided on the template object they are validated against the flavor provided.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Host Service Datatype Description The virtual host represents the platform on which virtual guests reside. At times a virtual host has no allocations on the physical server, however with many modern platforms it is a virtual machine with small CPU and Memory allocations that runs in the Control Domain. Local accountId A virtual host's associated account id Type: integer createDate The date a virtual host was created.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Network_SecurityGroup_NetworkComponentBinding
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Network_SecurityGroup_NetworkComponentBinding Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Virtual_Network_SecurityGroup_NetworkComponentBinding data type contains general information for a single binding. A binding associates a [[SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Network_Component]] with a [[SoftLayer_Network_SecurityGroup]]. Local id The unique ID for a binding. Type: integer networkComponentId The ID of the network component. Type: integer securityGroupId The ID of the security group. Type: integer Relational networkComponent Type: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Network_Component

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Storage_Repository
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Storage_Repository Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Virtual_Storage_Repository represents a web based storage system that can be accessed through many types of devices, interfaces, and other resources. Local capacity A storage repositories capacity measured in Giga-Bytes (GB) Type: float description A storage repositories description that describes its purpose or contents Type: string id Unique ID for a storage repository.

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Storage_Repository_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Storage_Repository_Type Datatype Description SoftLayer employs many different types of repositories that computing instances use as their storage volume. SoftLayer_Virtual_Storage_Repository_Type models a single storage type. Common types of storage repositories include networked file systems, logical volume management, and local disk volumes for swap and page file management. Local description A brief description os a storage repository type. Type: string name A storage repository type's name.
